translation: Looks like you need some medical attention. I'm calling in backup.
Kingpin is working with alien forces to abduct heroes and transport them in stasis orbs. You need to get to his warehouse before it's too late.
Kingpin said you might come looking for him. Your search ends here.
Why don't you pick on someone your own size?
Now take out these mercs and get to Kingpin.
So when do we get to find out what S.T.R.I.K.E. is about and what's going on here?
That's on a "need to know" basis, Spider-Man.
All you currently need to know is that you need to stop Kingpin and recover those orbs.
Geez. If I didn't "need to know," I wouldn't have asked.
The Kingpin ordered me to take you in. You're next on his list.
So Kingpin is trapping heroes in interdimensional orbs for some mysterious alien?
And Fury recruited us to stop him.
That's all we know?
Have you MET Nick Fury? I'm surprised he told us THAT much.
This is where Kingpin is keeping those interdimensional orbs.
How did Fisk get his hands on alien tech like this?
Fools. I'm a part of something much bigger now.
Didn't know you could get any bigger...
Good job stopping Kingpin. It will take us months to get enough power cores to open all these orbs.
And there are heroes trapped in ALL of these orbs?
We'll have to open them to know for sure.
I let one of the trucks escape so we can follow it to the source.
That's your next objective.
We traced the truck back to a covert Hydra base in the mountains.
HYDRA? The scary world domination guys? What have they got to do with this?
That's what we need to find out.
Get in there and find out what Hydra is doing with those orbs.
Kingpin and Hydra are abducting heroes and trapping them in orbs.
But what is Hydra doing with the orbs once they're here?
I get the feeling we're about to find out.
Great. More heroes for the boss.
Didn't even have to go out and abduct you guys.
All the orbs are being moved to the center of the base.
That must be where we'll find our answers.
You're too late. This portal is already fully active.
Wait. Did he say portal?
1 of 4 stages activated.
2 of 4 stages activated.
3 of 4 stages activated.
The device has been activated. Mission failed.
Interdimensional orbs. Genetically engineered soldiers. I picked a bad day to ditch school and join S.T.R.I.K.E.!
Colonel Fury says you need some firepower.
So he called you? Things are worse than I thought.
I'm here to do whatever it takes to complete the mission.
That's what I'm afraid of.
You will not stop Hydra and its new allies from converting this world.
Hydra is sending the orbs through an interdimensional portal. We need to shut it down.
Those Hydra Operators are sending the orbs through that interdimensional portal.
I got this. The rest of you move out of the way.
Punisher, we need to work as a team if we're going to get this done.
Fine, Cage. How do you want to do this?
We take down the <color=#fff568>OPERATORS</color> first to stop them from sending the orbs through.
You can take the lead on this one, Cage. But if things go sideways...
I'm doing it my way.
The Hydra Operators are sending the orbs through the portal.
We need to stop them before they send all the orbs through the portal.
THIS MISSION HAS A SPECIAL OBJECTIVE.
TAKE OUT THE HYDRA <color=#fff568>OPERATORS</color> BEFORE THEY GET TO STAGE 4.
The Hydra Operators have sent the first orb through the portal.
1 / 4 stages complete.
They've sent half the orbs through the portal.
2 / 4 stages complete.
They've sent another orb through the portal!
3 / 4 stages complete.
We didn't take out the OPERATORS in time. We're too late.
4 / 4 stages complete.
We stopped Hydra from sending those orbs through the portal.
But I get the feeling this fight is far from over.
Guys, my Spidey-Sense is going off the charts. Something BIG is heading this way.
What now?
Now we take down these weird blue guys guarding this portal and destroy it.
You make it sound so easy.
What's the deal with these blue aliens guarding the portal?
Don't care. As long as they go down when I shoot them.
Hulk SMASH!
Uh, guys? What's the Hulk doing on the wrong side of the "good guy" line?
What was up with that weaker, but equally scary, Hulk attacking us?!
That was NOT the Hulk from our dimension. He was a corrupted version from an alternate dimension.
Who in the what now?
Get back to base. It's time I told you the true purpose of S.T.R.I.K.E. and what we're dealing with.
I guess that means we finally "need to know."
I created S.T.R.I.K.E. to deal with interdimensional threats...
The kind of stuff even S.H.I.E.L.D. or the Avengers are not equipped to deal with.
So I'm assuming this qualifies?
Definitely. Interdimensional portals are opening up all over the world.
Corrupted versions of Earth's most powerful and dangerous people are pouring out through them.
And we're the only ones who can stop them.
Can't we all just get along?
These are NOT heroes from our dimension.
They are corrupted versions from alternate dimensions. Take them down.
Soon you will all bow to the new king.
I'm in communication with Nick Furys from other dimensions.
Many warned me about this interdimensional threat before losing contact.
I had hoped they would never find our dimension.
What's so special about our dimension?
Most dimensions only connect to one or two others. But ours is unique.
It's a Nexus between dimensions... a gateway to countless other Earths.
If this dimension falls, the invaders will have access to thousands of other dimensions.
Aww, Iron Man? They corrupted you, too?
Not corrupted, Parker. Liberated.
We have all been united for one singular purpose. You're next.
Gonna have to pass on that offer, Mr. Stark.
Kinda enjoying the whole "free will" thing.
There's more of you?
We got a whole army of Iron Mans from other dimensions.
You really ARE full of yourself.
A group of corrupted Rocket Raccoons is running rampant through the city.
Hold up. Are you saying there are multiple versions of those jet pack rats?
Yes. They've conquered hundreds of dimensions before coming here.
And each one has the flying, talking squirrel in it?
Yes. They're also weapons experts. Exercise caution.
Hey! Who let the trash pandas out of their cages?
What did you call us?!
So do we call animal control or what?
The Commander is sending us to infiltrate this base and kidnap Ronan, one of the Kree generals leading the invasion.
What's the point in kidnapping one of these guys?
We need to know what their plan is. Ronan has the intel we need.
I bet I can make him talk.
That's not how S.T.R.I.K.E. operates, Punisher. We hold ourselves to a higher standard.
Fall back. We ran out of time.
The big blue alien with the hammer is Ronan, the one we need to take down and bring back to base.
He looks pretty tough.
If this mission was easy, Fury wouldn't have sent S.T.R.I.K.E., right?
Fair enough. Let's do this.
If you think you can defeat Ronan the Accuser, you are sorely mistaken.
We don't want to defeat you...
We just want to kidnap and interrogate you.
THIS MISSION HAS A <color=#fff568>SPECIAL OBJECTIVE</color>.
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>RONAN</color> TO WIN.
This is a TIMED mission. Take out RONAN before time runs out.
We only need to take down Ronan. But we have to hurry.
We took too much time. We need to fall back.
We've got Ronan. Let's get out of here before reinforcements arrive.
We've got to get this Ronan guy back to base before he wakes up.
I've called for an extraction pod. We just need to hold out until it arrives.
The S.H.I.E.L.D. OPERATOR is down. She was our ride out of here!
The extraction pod has been called in.
1 / 3 stages complete.
The pod is zeroing in on our coordinates.
2 / 3 stages complete.
Prepare for extraction.
3 / 3 stages complete.
You're going to tell us everything we want to know about this invasion plan.
You will find out nothing from me.
Widow, prep the psychics.
Yes, sir.
We'll find out what Ronan knows, one way or another.
Colonel, we're receiving a broadcast on a restricted channel.
It's also being sent to every major intelligence agency and criminal organization in the world.
On screen.
Leaders of this dimension. I am Ultimus.
I have come to accept your unconditional surrender.
In the dimension I come from, you have all already joined my cause.
And on every Earth I conquer, it plays out the same way.
Some of you will join me. Others will resist. But eventually...
ALL WILL SUBMIT TO MY WILL.
And to the leaders of S.T.R.I.K.E. who have already begun to meddle in my plans. Know this...
You will be the first to fall.
Sir, detecting multiple enemies closing in on the Helicarrier!
Battle stations!
Never thought I'd say this, but...
We've come to get our Ronan back.
So they extracted your free will but left your sense of humor intact?
Another wave of Ultimus's forces just breached the Helicarrier!
They really want this Ronan guy back.
Which means we can't let them have him.
Hail Hydra! For Ultimus!
Sir, a squad of Ultimus's forces has infiltrated the Helicarrier.
Get them off this ship. Once we're clear, I'll engage the cloaking device.
Yes, sir.
Release Ronan now, and Ultimus might spare you.
Now you face the full power of the Hand.
The Helicarrier is secure. And the psychics were able to break through Ronan's mind.
Good. Cloaking engaged. That should buy us some time.
Now let's see what Ronan's hiding.
Tapping into Ronan's mind revealed a lot about Ultimus's invasion plan.
For starters, it appears he uses the last dimension he conquers as a staging area for his next assault.
So finding a way into that dimension could be the key to stopping the invasion?
Which means we need to build our own interdimensional portal.
And you want me to steal the components from Ultimus.
I'm on it.
What's the point of keeping psychics around when she reads minds like that?
Expect the base to be heavily guarded by corrupted S.H.I.E.L.D. agents.
Like these.
You'll need to cover me while I extract the schematics we need to build the portal.
You got it.
Cover me while I access the database for the schematics.
The schematics are being accessed.
1 / 4 stages complete.
Halfway through uploading the schematics.
2 / 4 stages complete.
Schematics almost uploaded.
3 / 4 stages complete.
Upload complete. Preparing for evacuation.
4 / 4 stages complete.
They've taken out Black Widow. Abort...
Can't let you leave with those schematics, Natasha.
Cap, isn't there still a small piece of you that knows you're on the wrong side?
There are no sides here, Black Widow. Just those loyal to Ultimus...
... and those who will be.
Clear the area so the extraction pod can land.
Transport is en route. Evacuation commencing.
We've analyzed the schematics to build our own portal.
Unfortunately, we're going to need a hyper-advanced artificial intelligence processor to operate it.
Where are we going to get something like that?
We're going to steal it. From an Ultron factory.
The robot? That took on ALL of the Avengers at once? And almost won?
We'll be in and out before they even know we were there.
Yeah. 'Cause that's what happens ALL the time.
We'll need to get past these Ultron sentries to get into the base.
The Ultron mainframe should be up ahead.
Good. The sooner we get out of this killer robot factory, the happier I'll be.
INTRUDER ALERT!
We better get past these sentries quick before the whole base is alerted.
Be prepared for a fight.
Ultron is not likely to just hand over his central processor.
You said we'd be in and out! "They probably won't even know we're here," you said.
I lied.
Did you think I wouldn't notice you little pests scurrying around my home?
Let's get this back to the Helicarrier. We have a portal to build.
Elektra says the Hand Ninja Clan might possess a mystical artifact we could use to power the portal.
We need to infiltrate their fortress and steal it.
Not a fan of ninjas.
Pretty sure they're not a fan of you either, Punisher.
You seek the artifact, but will only find death here.
With this artifact, we now have everything we need to build the portal.
The portal is almost complete, but Ultimus's forces are onto us.
Hold them off until construction is complete.
My pleasure.
We need to hold them off until the portal is complete.
Cover me while I power up the portal.
Then what?
Then you and the team go through and gather intel behind enemy lines.
What about you?
I need to stay on this side and keep the portal open as long as I can.
But they'll overrun you!
Kid, I'm not even going to bother with the whole "for the greater good" speech.
Just cover me until this damn thing is open.
Initiating portal activation.
1 / 4 stages complete.
Establishing transdimensional link.
2 / 4 stages complete.
Hold on a little longer... almost got it...
3 / 4 stages complete.
The portal is open. Quick! Go through!
4 / 4 stages complete.
We're too late. We couldn't open the portal in time.
The portal is open. Go through. Now!
We're not leaving without you, Fury.
That's an order, soldier.
There's no way you can take them on yourself.
I can handle myself.
Besides, if you don't find a way to defeat Ultimus in that dimension...
None of this will matter.
Now GO.
This entire dimension has been conquered by Ultimus.
So why are we here exactly?
The best place to acquire intel about your enemy is behind enemy lines.
Also a great place to get killed.
Make sure we're not detected by any Ravager patrols.
Like this one?
They've called for reinforcements. We're too late.
Quick! We have to take them out before they call for backup.
Captain America? This isn't some sort of trick, is it?
I don't think I can stand having another one of my heroes go evil on me.
I'm not controlled by Ultimus, Spider-Man. Now let's get to work.
How are you still fighting Ultimus in this dimension?
Our Bruce Banner developed a vaccine to Ultimus's Conversion Engine just before the entire dimension fell to Ultimus.
Let me guess: There was just one dose.
Yep. He insisted I take it.
Any chance we can recreate the formula?
Maybe. But it would require infiltrating a high-security Kree laboratory.
I was SO hoping you weren't going to say that.
This Kree laboratory has the tech we need to reverse engineer a vaccine from my blood.
All we have to do is fight our way through an army of enhanced Ultimus-controlled heroes.
Hook me up to the lab, extract the vaccine, and fight our way out.
Well, when you put it like that...
The lab is just a little farther. We'll have to take down these guards first.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>CAPTAIN AMERICA</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Let's get me hooked up to that lab and extract the vaccine.
I'm going in the machine.
Your S.H.I.E.L.D. Operator should be able to extract enough material to reverse engineer a vaccine.
What are the chances this works?
About 4%.
Best odds I've had in years. Let's do it.
You'll have to watch over the S.H.I.E.L.D. Operator while I'm in the tank.
Accessing Super-Soldier DNA.
1 / 4 stages complete.
Administering sedative prior to extraction.
2 / 4 stages complete.
Extracting vaccine tracers. Just one more step...
3 / 4 stages complete.
Vaccine extracted! We're done.
4 / 4 stages complete.
Ultimus's Thor Corps patrols this area. We have to be careful.
Thor Corps? Like an army of Thors? Seriously?
We'll have to defeat the Thor Corps if you want to make it back to your dimension with the vaccine.
Surrender now and accept your fate.
Cap's still pretty weak. We'll have to protect him until he recovers.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>CAPTAIN AMERICA</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Cap's been taken out!
Ultimus's own version of the Defenders, the Annihilators, are tracking us. We need to get away fast.
Annihilators, looks like we've tracked down our prey.
Now comes the fun part.
Talk is cheap. Let's fast forward to the part where we crack some skulls.
Ultimus has begun his invasion of your dimension.
He's moving his fleet of ships through massive portals into your Earth.
This is your only chance to get back to your Earth with the vaccine.
Great! Anywhere we can buy a ticket to get on one of those battleships?
We'll need to take out a Kree patrol and "borrow" their IDs to board the ship.
Here's our chance. Take out this patrol so you can use their identities to get on board the battleship.
The fleet is taking off. It's now or never. Better get going.
What about you? Aren't you coming with us?
This is my home. Even if it has already fallen to Ultimus, I can't leave it.
Go save your world. Stop Ultimus. I'll keep up the fight here until you return.
We need to clear out this hold and hide out until the warship returns to our dimension.
I think I hear somebody coming.
Well, we gotta take 'em out. Can't risk alerting the Kree crew.
Stowaways! How dare you sully the sacred fleet of Ultimus with your unworthy presence.
Great. We made it back to our dimension. Now what?
Now we fight our way off this tin can and get the vaccine to Fury.
Actually, that sounds like a pretty good plan.
I have my moments.
Sweet! Target practice. Been a while since we've blasted us some rebels.
I am Groot.
Groot says, "You're not getting off this ship alive."
Looks like the invasion is in full effect back here at home.
We need to get this vaccine to Fury. He'll know what to do with it.
Just one problem with that...
Director Fury has been captured by Ultimus.
Director, we are receiving a recorded distress call from the Captain America of the Fallen Dimension we visited.
On screen.
To the leaders of S.T.R.I.K.E. from the Nexus Dimension, I've got some good news.
Our Bruce Banner was injected with a partial vaccination to Ultimus's conversion process when he was abducted.
He has been on the run from Ultimus for the past few years, struggling to maintain his sanity.
If you send a team to this dimension to help track him down, we could complete the vaccination.
This might be our best and last chance at a real cure for the corruption process--
--IF we can find this Hulk before Ultimus's kill squad does.
Stark, you up for a little interdimensional journey?
My suit is already packed.
Figuratively. Of course.
Thanks for coming, Tony. I hope it's worth it.
Anything to help an old friend... from a different dimension.
I gave your S.H.I.E.L.D. Operator our Bruce Banner's unique gamma radiation signature.
Our only chance is to pinpoint his location before Ultimus's forces find him.
AND here they come now.
Pinpointing Hulk's location... Target within a 1 km radius...
1 / 4 stages complete.
Target within 500 meters...
2 / 4 stages complete.
Target traced to within a 100-meter location.
3 / 4 stages complete.
We've found him! He's inside that warehouse up ahead.
4 / 4 stages complete.
They took out our operator! Abort...
Bruce! It's me, Cap. Your friend. You with us, buddy?
Steve! You found me! I'm fighting this... as best I can... but... it's very... agh...
GRARGH!!! MY ULTRONS! DO AS I COMMAND! SMASH THEM!
Well, looks like Bruce is somewhere in there. But we have to knock him out quickly.
STEVE ROGERS, YOU FOOLISH MAN. I WILL DESTROY YOU.
Is it just me, or does this Hulk seem a little more... articulate?
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>HULK</color> TO WIN.
Alright, he's out cold! Cap, give him the sedative. Quick!
Bruce, how are you feeling?
Weaker... but my mind is clear...
What happened to you?
I have a partial vaccine in my bloodstream. I can only resist Ultimus for so long.
And I'm permanently trapped in this Hulk state.
I can't believe you've been hiding from Ultimus this whole time.
Ultimus has sent multiple kill squads. I scavenged a couple of Ultron drones to defend me.
It looks like another one of Ultimus's kill squads just found us.
We need to protect Hulk in his weakened state!
PROTECT <color=#fff568>HULK</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
This Hulk must be put down. Step aside.
It should take them a while to regroup. Where to?
If we can get to my lab in Nevada, I think I can use samples from Cap's blood to complete the vaccination.
Then that's where we'll go.
Am I the ONLY one freaked out from the Hulk talking like that?
They took down the Hulk. We've failed...
Bruce, I'm seeing a lot of Kree and mercenaries outside of your facility.
That's no surprise. Ultimus has a huge contingent of troops guarding the place.
FOLLOW ME TO THE ROOFTOP ENTRANCE.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>HULK</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
TAKING SEDATIVE. LOSING CONTROL...
It's okay, Bruce, we've got you.
Bruce... NO!!!
Tony, we're inside, but there are a ton of Hydra troops up ahead.
We need to protect Bruce while he's sedated like this.
On it.
We need to fight our way to the lab.
Let's move, team.
We lost the Hulk!
I'm feeling much better... but each sedative is becoming less effective...
We need to move fast. Up ahead I expect heavy Hydra resistance.
Time to pull out all the stops.
We gotta move quickly... don't know how much longer I can keep it together...
PROTECT <color=#fff568>HULK</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Bruce, I'm so sorry.
MUST TAKE SEDATIVE... LAST CHANCE... TO... WORK...
We're in the home stretch here. Lay low, Bruce.
Just a little farther until we get to the lab.
You think when we complete the vaccine that he'll go back to being Bruce Banner?
Don't know. Why?
Because smart Hulk really weirds me out.
I look forward to removing your spine. You should feel great honor for this.
We lost Bruce!
The sedative is not working right...
Your lab is just up ahead, Bruce! Hang in there!
Bruce, what's wrong?
I feel weak... but also... much STRONGER...
Well, if you feel up to it, we could definitely use your help.
It looks like Ultimus's Avengers are standing in our way.
Look what got caught in my web.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>HULK</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Bruce, I'm so sorry.
GET ME TO THE TEST CHAMBER.
WE ARE OUT OF TIME... I WILL... BE GONE... SOON...
Let's move! No time to waste!
IN CHAMBER. OPERATOR CAN EXTRACT CORRUPTION FROM ME.
Bruce, how do we know this will even work?
MUST TRY... NO MORE... TIME...
Bruce, hang in there, buddy. We've got this.
We have run out of time. Protect the operator at all costs!
Pinpointing location of corruption within Dr. Banner...
1 / 4 stages complete.
Beginning extraction process...
2 / 4 stages complete.
Stabilizing Dr. Banner... almost done...
3 / 4 stages complete.
Corruption extracted! Dr. Banner is stable!
Great work!
4 / 4 stages complete.
They took out our operator! Bruce isn't gonna make it.
Bruce, how are you feeling?
Whole. Finally. But it appears I may be stuck in this state.
Was afraid he was going to say that.
I have Bruce Banner's mind trapped in the Hulk's body.
But at least we have you back.
Yes. And more importantly...
I think I might have found a way to REVERSE Ultimus's Corruption process.
Director Fury. I might know of a way for us to defeat Ultimus once and for all.
Long ago, here on Midgard, I fought a Kree Eternal by the name of Ard-Con.
Upon further reflection, I believe he is, in fact, the Ultimus of our dimension.
Interesting. And I bet the invading Ultimus doesn't like having another one of himself around.
He probably eliminates his version in every dimension he conquers.
Indeed. Though I imagine he might be having difficulty with that.
I buried him deep underground in a prison of Asgardian design.
I also divided the key into 3 pieces to ensure he would never surface again.
Maybe he would be willing to defend himself against... himself. If we freed him.
Men are willing to go to great lengths for their freedom.
Put a team together and collect the keys.
It will be done.
I hid the first key here in your Amazon.
Looks like we've got company.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>THOR</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Thor! No!!!
We are close to the first key. Not far now.
It appears that the invading Ultimus is searching for the keys as well.
We must make haste if we are to find Ard-Con before he does.
So where do you think he got the name "Ultimus" from?
Maybe it's a smash-up of "Ultimately Fabulous?"
Stay out of our way. Ard-Con is ours to take.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>THOR</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
I've recovered the first key. We need to keep moving.
Drax the Destroyer, your assistance is appreciated in this quest!
We will crush our enemies and see them driven before us!
The second key is here in the forests of Guilin.
This world is constantly the center of galactic conflict.
I like it.
Indeed.
Korath of the Kree Resistance demands that you return Ard-Con to us!
PROTECT <color=#fff568>THOR</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
It appears we have a third interested party in our quest.
The second key is just up ahead.
Good. More Kree for us to fight as well.
Thor, stop now. The Kree Resistance intend to take Ard-Con as a bargaining chip with Ultimus.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>THOR</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
I've recovered the second key. Make haste!
The third key is near the ruins of Sokovia.
Be watchful for Ultimus's and Korath's forces. They will stop at nothing to get the keys.
They will be very upset when we beat them to the key once again.
To arms! It is a trap.
Hello there, fools.
Ultimus said I get to keep a trophy of this battle for myself.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>THOR</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
The battle is won.
The third key is just up ahead.
This is the site of the final key.
Victory will be ours because of my superior fighting skills!
Korath, these heathens think they can defeat us.
The Supreme Intelligence demands we defeat them.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>THOR</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
We now have all three keys. Hurry, to Ard-Con's tomb.
The tomb is just up ahead. We must secure the dig site.
I can dig it.
Been wanting to test out some new modifications.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>THOR</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
So you locked our dimension's Ultimus in a prison after you fought him?
As a Kree Eternal, he was almost impossible to defeat.
An eternal prison was the only option.
And everyone is okay with letting ANOTHER version of these guys out?
If we can turn Ard-Con to our side against the invader, it could turn the tide in this war.
And if the invading Ultimus is bent on his destruction, we must prevent it.
Thor, this is your last chance. Stand down, or we will be forced to destroy you!
When will they ever learn?
PROTECT <color=#fff568>THOR</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Drax, we must protect our S.H.I.E.L.D. Operator while she opens the tomb.
This enemy threat will be the greatest we have faced yet.
At last. Are we sure the little red spider alien will survive the battle?
For the last time, Drax. I'm NOT an alien. Just a human in a suit!
I still do not understand the customs of your alien culture.
Hey Korath, if we work together on this one, I'll split the bounty with you.
I fight for the honor of the Kree, mercenary. But today you are my ally nonetheless.
Cover me while I open Ard-Con's tomb!
I've put the 3 pieces of the key together.
1 / 4 stages complete.
The key has been activated.
2 / 4 stages complete.
I'm inserting the key now. The chamber is almost open.
3 / 4 stages complete.
They've defeated our operator... We have failed this realm...
Ard-Con. I have released you from your prison.
Yet you were the one who imprisoned me in the first place.
Tell me, Thor Odinson. What is the reason for my newfound freedom?
There is a threat to the Kree Empire that requires your assistance.
A threat to the Empire? From whom?
You.
My spies say that Kingpin has fallen out of Ultimus's favor.
He plans on using the Conversion Engine on Kingpin to ensure his loyalty.
Kingpin shouldn't have allied with the enemy in the first place.
Ultimus is holding him in a captured S.H.I.E.L.D. facility. If we were to free him, I'm sure he would join our cause.
Well, at least it would be one less threat to deal with. Do what you have to.
We need to take out these guards quickly and silently before they sound the alarm.

Kingpin is being held at the lowest level of the base.
We must move quickly before they detect us.

Protect Kingpin while we fight our way out of here.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>KINGPIN</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Bullseye. I'm not surprised to see you working for Ultimus.

Fury, Nobu has been overthrown as leader of the Hand.
The new leader is secretly working for Ultimus.

By ancient law, if we challenge him and defeat his champions...
...we will rule the Hand ourselves.
If you think our team can beat them... go for it.
We must defeat the Hand champions to claim leadership.
Daredevil, by the ancient law of the Hand...
We challenge you to ritual combat.
I accept the challenge.
This is the final round of ritual combat. Be prepared.
Let's see how you do against a real martial artist.
Now you face a true master.
We are victorious. Relinquish control of the Hand.

We need to work together as a team to survive.
Now we face Daredevil and his lieutenants.
Your friends will not help you now.

Ultimus gave us a new name...
The Annihilators.
Strike quickly and decisively, and we will be victorious.
Before Ultimus decided I'd be more obedient as a mindless slave...
He had me work with a corrupted Tony Stark on spinning up Ultron factories.
If Ultimus builds an Ultron army, he'll overrun the planet in days.

This first Ultron factory is run by a corrupted Black Panther.
Take out his patrols quickly.

This would be the optimal place to plant charges in the facility.
Cover my demolitions expert until he sets the charges. Got it?

Cover me while I arm the explosives.
Wiring the explosives...

Well done. Time to go take care of the next facility.

That talking rat psychopath set up automated defenses everywhere.

Can we just fight already?
I am Groot.

We could use A.I.M. as an ally in this war.
If we help you take back control of the island, will you join S.T.R.I.K.E.?

Expect to encounter A.I.M. Security on patrol with Hydra Soldiers.

These fools meddle in things they cannot control.
These abominations must be stopped.
Abominations are in a different wing. But I agree, we should stop those, too.
Just keep your distance. They spread their infections if they hit you.
Up ahead is the Advanced Sciences wing of the compound.
Here we test the limits of the human body to all extremes.
How much longer does this nightmare tour take before we fight your corrupted counterpart?
What IS that?!
This is an A.I.M. Monstrosity, one of my proudest creations. Sadly, this one is controlled by Ultimus.
A worthy opponent. I look forward to when we can use these on OUR side.
Here we have our most interesting experiments in development.
For instance, Ultimus gave us some Hulk specimens to experiment with.

We AIM to--

Fantastic.

Now that we've taken care of the most dangerous projects...
We can face my doppelganger directly.
Finally. Not sure I can take more than one of you.
I'm astounded the others continue to follow you.
You are clearly an inferior specimen.

Productivity is up 16% since I took over for you.
Save it for your next job interview, pitiful clone.

I can't send S.T.R.I.K.E. to do this. It goes against everything they stand for.

<bzzzt> You are trespassing on Stark Industries property. Deadly force has been authorized.

How is your research going?

DESTROY. RAZE. ERADICATE.

Master?

KILL. SLAUGHTER. MAIM.

DESTROY. RAZE. ERADICATE.

Rumlow, stay on task. Get it done.
Hi there, friends!

Break into the facility and gain access to their data control center.

In a dimension ruled by Star-Lord? Not surprised.
Star-Lord, he who shines brightest, will have your heads!

Protect our operator while she pinpoints the location of the Ego Seed.

I expect the facility to be guarded by the most elite of S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and corrupted heroes.
Good. Been itching to punch some familiar faces for once.
Star-Lords... MORE Star-Lords... Just... ugh...
One step closer to getting off this rock.
Alright, we've made it inside.
Move quickly. They will enhance security the longer you take.

Almost done here. The central core is just up ahead.

Protect our operator while she extracts the seed from their power production.

All the more reason to move quickly.
Cover me while I extract the Ego Seed.

1 / 4 stages complete.
Fighting off security protocols.
2 / 4 stages complete.
Beginning the extraction process. Almost there.
3 / 4 stages complete.

How long until this place swallows itself up whole?

Time's a wasting!
Pathetic cretins! Return the Ego Seed or die!
Yeah, give it back, you jerks! That's mine!

Delete all records of this mission. It never happened. Are we clear?
Understood.
Good to see you're finally willing to do what needs to be done to win this War.
Commander, we have a crisis on our hands.
After creating our own dimensional portal, Director Fury was captured by Ultimus.
We think we've found a lead on his location: a corrupted S.H.I.E.L.D. facility in Colorado.
If we take a full team out there, we might be able to rescue him before he is converted.
Fury is somewhere in this facility.
Fury is being held on that Kree warship.
Now we just need to find a way on board.
We need to get onto that Kree warship and rescue Fury before they convert him.
Any suggestions?
I say we charge in, guns blazing.
I like the way this guy thinks.
Shocker.
I bet I can punch that guy farther than you can.
Challenge accepted.
Fury should be up ahead. Let's move.
If we are NOT able to rescue Nick Fury in time...
Who will become the leader of S.T.R.I.K.E.?
Let me guess: You think it should be YOU.
I am clearly the most qualified at leading an army of highly trained--
Not going to happen, Turnip Head.
We should be close to Fury's location.
We need to move quickly if we're going to save Fury before the conversion is complete.
Director Fury is being held in the conversion chamber up ahead.
Stop their operators from completing the process. We need to free him from the device!
Take out their operators so we can get Director Fury out of there!

If we don't take out those operators, Fury will not survive.

Ultimus's full-scale invasion has begun.
We need to secure New York City. Deploy the team.

A Grove of Groots.

I am GROOT!

A corrupted Ultron army is approaching Wakanda.
A S.T.R.I.K.E. team is on its way.
We claim this territory in Ultimus's name.

Intel has pinpointed the location of a Kree transport in New York City.
Sneak your way onto it and take down the capital ship above the city.
We're on it.
There's the transport. Let's make this quick.
I'll draw their attention. You pick 'em off.
Now we need to sabotage that Kree warship.
Aliens. Portal. The whole thing still seems weird to me.

ANY Ultimus, you idiot. Including the Ultimus from our dimension.

I can't see how that plan could POSSIBLY go wrong. Oh wait, let me do the math again...

We are now sworn enemies in this war.

Ultimus promised that the Kree would rule our dimension.
He did not mention it would be ruled under his iron fist.
Ultimus is mad with power. His first act as ruler was to destroy the Supreme Intelligence.
Ronan the Accuser led a Kree rebellion until he was captured.
If we can free Ronan from Ultimus's prison before he is corrupted, the Kree Resistance will join with S.T.R.I.K.E.
The Kree could be a valuable ally in the war. We will help you free Ronan.
These corrupted will not stand between us and our goal.
Ronan is being held near here. We must move quickly.
Ultimus is keeping Ronan on this planet.

Setting search parameters for Ronan.

Triangulating Ronan's location to within 3 kilometers.

I will purge the galaxy of this false idol and scatter his ashes to the solar winds.
THIS is why you are destined to be the next leader of the Kree Resistance.

My people will rally to my call. Ultimus must face judgment.

Take the transmitter, and I will send the word of truth to every corner of the empire.
It appears our plan must wait. I sense a growing storm on the horizon.
Ultimus has sent the Thors and Hulks of conquered dimensions to stop us.

Crush these heretics, and I will broadcast the message to my people.
We will get you inside.

And are all found GUILTY!
We cannot hold back Ultimus's forces for long.
Ronan, send your message.

Defend my operator while the signal is sent.
Filthy Kree. It is my destiny to destroy you in Ultimus's name.
Defend me while I broadcast Ronan's message.
Starting up the signal enhancement generators.
1 / 4 stages complete.
Tracking down all Kree broadcast towers.

Opening all Kree broadcast channels.

Peace will not come until all Kree are united as one.

We have located Ultimus's energy station that powers his massive portals.
It is on the planet Contraxia.
Contraxia? That ice ball is full of outlaws, Ravagers, and mercenaries.
My kind of people.

And destroy the energy station.
Thor, you had me at "lo."
Ravagers. Shocker. Let's light it up!
The energy fortress should be up ahead.
Drax, we have to take out this patrol before they alert the entire base.
Keep everything on the down-low.
I do not keep anything DOWN or LOW. But I will swiftly vanquish these enemies.
Why do I even bother?
We must take out their operators, or they will alert the entire fortress.
They're alerting the fortress.
1 / 4 stages complete.
We need to stop their operators.
2 / 4 stages complete.
We are running out of time. Stop their operators.
3 / 4 stages complete.
It's too late. We must retreat.
Onward into the fortress.
Defeating these guards is the only way to get into the station and destroy it.
Thank you, Captain Obvious.

For Asgard!

Combing through the systems here. It looks like Ultimus has a Scientist Supreme running the show.
I am Groot.

These soulless automatons are no match for my blades.
Well put, Drax the Destroyer. Attack!

This corrupted Yondu holds the security key that will give us access to the engineering control room.
Yondu loves me. Let me handle this.
Peter, every corrupted version of Yondu we encounter tries to kill you.
But only out of LOVE.
Big mistake showing up here, kid. I'm afraid we're going to have to kill y'all.
See, Gamora. He loves me!
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>YONDU</color> TO WIN.

We do not need to destroy this place to the sky. Only destroy it.

I am Groot?
Yeah, Groot. Maybe his mom DID drop him on his head as a baby.

Planting the worm to take control of the reactors.

I AM GROOT!!!

Let's go, people. You snooze, you lose.

As expected, I did not sleep, and so I was victorious!
We must hurry. The fortress is about to explode.

Destroying Ultimus's energy station prevents him from transporting more troops into this dimension.
Glad to help out.
Now we must rally the Kree Resistance and take back their home planet.
Oh yeah. Forgot about that.

DEFEAT <color=#fff568>SPIDER-MAN</color> TO WIN.
Now I simply don Spider-Man's likeness and...

Gaining access to security controls through back door channels.

Replacing all security camera footage with empty loop footage.

Disabling backup generators for security lockdown procedures.

DEFENSE MODE INITIATED.

The Nexus of All Realities.

The entrance to the Nexus of All Realities is somewhere on Earth.

I can take a team of mystics to acquire versions of the artifacts from dimensions Ultimus has yet to invade.

DEFEAT <color=#fff568>KINGPIN</color> TO WIN.

<color=#fff568>BARON MORDO</color> HEALS AFTER EACH DEATH.
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>BARON MORDO</color> TO WIN.

Now we need to secure the Warlock's Eye and the Siege Perilous to open the Nexus.
I found a version of the Siege Perilous in a dimension that has been overrun by Hydra.
An entire dimension ruled by Hydra? Sounds pleasant.
The next mystical item we need to open the Nexus is the Siege Perilous.
The closest dimension where it exists is ruled by Hydra.
I'll lead a team of mystics to that dimension to retrieve the Siege Perilous.
An entire dimension ruled by Hydra? Sounds like my worst nightmare.
Worse than an interdimensional invasion of corrupted versions of ourselves?

PROTECT <color=#fff568>HAWKEYE</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.

Uh, nice to meet you, too.

If you can get it from them, the S.H.I.E.L.D. Resistance will have a shot at overthrowing Hydra.
Help me get past the Hydra patrols and back to our base, and I'll help you with your mission.

We can't get around this patrol. Gotta put them down to move along.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>HAWKEYE</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.

Frankly, that sounds like a lot more fun than what's going on here.
Hawkeye, nice to run into you here. Red Skull will be pleased to finally have your head.
If we take out Crossbones first, his platoon will scatter.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>HAWKEYE</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>CROSSBONES</color> TO WIN.
They took out Hawkeye! We have no way to find the Resistance HQ now.
Hawkeye, welcome back to HQ. Looks like you found some new friends along the way?

The S.H.I.E.L.D. Resistance is on its last leg. If we don't take down Red Skull soon, we'll never free the world from Hydra.
Perhaps we can help. We need to take the Siege Perilous from Red Skull.
We've been trying to get that artifact from Red Head for years. If you manage that, we could turn the tide.
Director! Hydra troops have breached the perimeter! They've found us!
Natasha, you've been working for Hydra all along? How could you?
Give up now. You cannot defeat Red Skull. Hydra is far too powerful.
We have to take out the Hydra Operators before they can call in air support!
They're calling for air support.
1 / 4 stages complete.
We have to stop them!
2 / 4 stages complete.
We're running out of time. Take out the operators!
3 / 4 stages complete.
We're finished. Their bombers will be here any minute!
We need to bring the fight directly to Red Skull. I've got an idea...
Director Quake, what's the plan?

If we can get inside and corner him, we can grab his access codes and use them to get into Red Skull's bunker.
That lab has a bunch of civilian scientists working there. We need to protect them if we get into a firefight.
Good call, Hawkeye.
Remember, we need to protect the civilians at all costs.
PROTECT THE <color=#fff568>CIVILIANS</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
They took out the civilians!
Red Skull's spymaster is in the lab up ahead. Let's move!

Well, he used to run S.H.I.E.L.D., but it turned out he was part of Hydra all along.
You can't mean--
Nick Fury.
Oh. I thought you were going to say someone else.
