Our operator is down. No way inside that orb now.
Field disruption is stable. Go now!
Let's do this.
Lang, Bucky and I are with you. \nTime to get small!
Huh, this is interesting... Looks like a giant, well, tiny, megastructure inside this orb.
I think I can see some kind of access door down there.
What. Is. This?
Prepare for conversion.
There's a tiny jungle in here. With tiny cranes. And even tiny corrupted Hydra forces.
Of course there are.
Lang, what the heck are we even LOOKING at in here?
Now, I could be wrong, I'm just an electrical engineer...
But I THINK we're on some sort of tiny version of... Earth?
Inside some kind of a planetary Dyson Sphere? It's got an artificial sun in here and everything.
Sure. Still not the strangest place I've been.
My scans have confirmed this definitely resembles our Earth, just a lot... smaller?
What about that fleet of Kree warships off in the distance over there?
It looks like Ultimus is planning some sort of tiny invasion from here.
Let's head back outside, grow to normal size, tell S.T.R.I.K.E., maybe then chuck this thing into the sun...
...after we fight this tiny Thanos and his tiny daughters. Of course.
You may have found this planet, but you will never leave it alive.
We will make sure of that. It is the will of Ultimus.
Shouldn't you be off looking for an itty bitty infinity gauntlet? Leave us out of this.
Okay, let's get the heck off of this rock.
Can't happen fast enough...
Initiating growth sequence, stand by...
Quake, you will not believe what we found inside this thing.
Lang, not now! We are under attack. Get back up here and help us!
What's going on? Who's attacking us!?
Who do you think? That corrupted Vision has launched a full-on assault on the Helicarrier.
Hey Tiny Dude, get your squad out here and ready to fight.
Yes sir, Hawkeye, sir. Right away, sir!
Stop saying, "sir."
Yes, sir. I mean, sorry, sir. Sorry.
Oh man, that orb was crazy! There's a tiny Earth inside there. A tiny Earth!
Focus, Lang. One full-blown crisis at a time.
Fair enough.
So that mega orb has a tiny planet inside. And there's a tiny Kree invasion!
That structure simulates sunlight and is suspending the entire planet somehow and...
--Look that's great and all, but we have a major problem.
Indeed. Disrupting the stasis field has made the orb unstable.
It's only a matter of time before the orb explodes in a massive supernova. Quite fascinating!
A regular massive supernova or a tiny massive supernova?
Never mind, that sounds bad regardless.
Yep. This is beyond our expertise, Lang. We need Hope.
Time to give her a call. Now.
THAT sounds like fun...
Hey Hope, Scott here. Man oh man have I got a story for you...
What did you screw up this time?
Can you help us figure out how to prevent a tiny version of Earth from exploding?
I'm on my way.
Wasp, any luck tracking down the Hydra team that stole the cache of Pym tech from your company's facilities?
I managed to trace the energy signature of the tech to a facility in the heart of the city.
We can't let that tech fall into Hydra hands.
I'll do some light recon. Be ready to bring in the cavalry when I give you the go-ahead.
Huh. Wasn't expecting to see a bunch of corrupted Scott Langs working as Hydra lackeys.
Yeah, well joke's on you, lady. We're the Ant-Men, and we're here to fumigate you.
Okay. Now I can officially confirm that even the corrupted versions of you are dorks.
USE WASP'S <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color>\nTO <color=#fff568>STUN</color> A TARGET WHEN CHARGED.
USE HER <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color>\nTO <color=#fff568>ATTACK ALL</color>, EVEN <color=#fff568>STEALTHED</color> TARGETS.
That was a lot more fun than it should have been. Time to see what Hydra is doing here.
But first, I should call Scott and tell him about this nonsense...
Entrance is secured.
Confirmed. Get ready to move in.
Squad, looks like you got here just in time.
Time is the LAST thing you've got.
Analysis indicates this facility was being used to construct an orb chamber.
An orb chamber harnessing Pym Particles? No wonder they had such a tough squad guarding it.
Not tough enough.
Energy signatures are spiking in the processing sector up ahead.
Then it's a good thing we're here to put a stop to this operation.
I'm seeing signs that Wakandan tech is being used here. That combined with Pym tech...
Will prove to be your end.
Pym's technology is truly a marvel. When combined with my people's technology --
It gives me twice as many reasons to stop you from using it.
What's so important about the orbs that can be made in this chamber?
Imagine being able to store the energy of a star or a planet in a single orb.
Or having a Kree Noble unleash a massive space fleet from the palm of her hands.
Let's just hope they haven't made any orbs with one of these things yet.
I've got a call coming in from Scott. One sec.
Hey Hope, Scott here. Man oh man have I got a story for you...
What did you screw up this time?
So let me get this straight...
You found a mysterious orb, went inside and found a tiny Earth, and now it's going to explode.
In a nutshell, yeah. Well, an orb. You get the idea.
I was telling these guys that we should just fire it at the sun and be done with it.
And, what, just incinerate the billions of tiny people in the process?
Oh, right. Yeah, that's a terrible plan. Maybe you should be coming up with the plans.
We'll focus our resources on further analyzing the origin of the orb's contents.
I'll track down corrupted Vision's ship, see if we can find any information on where this micro-planet came from.
And keep an eye on Ant-Man while I'm at it. You know, make sure he doesn't accidentally set off any other super bombs.
Nice. That's... Yeah, that's fair.
So how are we going to find corrupted Vision's ship?
I just sent out a distress call to corrupted forces asking for assistance from his team.
Working with you is SO much easier than working alone.
<color=#fff568>ANT-MAN</color> AND <color=#fff568>WASP</color>\nARE VERY EFFECTIVE <color=#fff568>TOGETHER</color> IN COMBAT.
ANT-MAN'S <color=#fff568>BASIC ABILITY</color>\nGIVES THEM BOTH A <color=#fff568>POSITIVE EFFECT</color> FROM THE TARGET.
WHEN BRINGING <color=#fff568>BOTH HEROES</color> INTO A FIGHT,\nANT-MAN'S <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> IS MUCH STRONGER.
Now that we took them out, we can take their shuttle and use autopilot to return to Vision's ship.
You make this look so easy! It never goes this smooth for me.
Further analysis of the mini-Earth shows that it is from another fallen dimension.
Ultimus has found a way to shrink the entire planet using Pym tech.
So if we return the orb to its dimension and find a way to reverse the process...
We could save the planet before it becomes too unstable and explodes.
But these mini-guys are bad guys, right?
They're not bad, Scott. Just corrupted by Ultimus. It's the right thing to do.
That doesn't come naturally to me. But I promised I would try harder so...
Let's do it. As long as I get to change my name to Captain Mini-Planet.
No.
Fine.
Be on the lookout for all kinds of strange experiments Vision may have been working on.
I... AM... ULTIMUS...
Okay, obviously this Groot has been genetically modified so it can speak in a way that we can understand more easily.
So that DID just happen? I'm not losing my mind after all?
You're a lot of things, Scott, but you're not crazy.
You're Ant Person and The Wasp, right? Yeah, Vision wants you, like, 200% more dead.
Here I go killin' again!
Well that was a fun dumpster fire to deal with. What's next?
A dozen 60-foot tall Rocket Raccoons?\nA horde of A.I.M. minions shooting tiny A.I.M. minions out of their mouths?
What?! Where?
Just a hypothetical. Jumpy much?
The vessel's command center is up ahead. Vision is bound to be in there.
If Deadpool and Cable couldn't finish him off, how are we gonna beat him?
For starters? We can make ourselves small enough to go inside one of his nanites and corrupt it.
Thereby starting a chain reaction which will make him de-materialize! Good idea.
The odds of executing such a plan are far from probable.
But I certainly welcome the challenge.
What is it you hope to accomplish by coming here?
Your little experiment with Pym tech has made this whole planet unstable. We're setting it right.
Ultimus will not allow it. This experiment is too valuable.
Oh yeah? Well we're gonna blow up all your research, too. So there!
Next time let's not telegraph our plans to the bad guys, okay, Scott?
Vision is finished, finally.\nAnd we located the dimensional rift where this planet comes from.
The rift is in China.\nDeploying a team now.
Can we stop at that place with all the pandas on our way? I've always wanted to hug a panda.
Right. Maybe AFTER we send mini-Earth back to its home and reverse the process.
Then pandas.
We need to send the orb through the rift and reverse the process. This orb is de-stabilizating fast.
Yep, and all we gotta do is beat the crap out of all those ninjas guarding the portal.
We will protect this portal with our lives.
Bummer.
Okay, the path is clear.
Right behind you.
It's too bad we can't take anything with us from tiny Earth before we send it home.
Like a keepsake?
Yeah, like an Eiffel Tower key chain that is the ACTUAL Eiffel Tower. Something like that.
Right. Do the right thing. No stealing of national monuments.
The Hand of Ultimus will never let you near his most prized dimension.
Ant-Man and The Wasp disagree.
Are we going with "Ant-Man and Wasp" or "Wasp and Ant-Man?" And do you prefer "The Wasp" or just "Wasp?"
Scott, shut up and fight.
Hope, you need to hurry. That thing is going to explode in a matter of minutes.
Vision's team set up a lab in here surrounding the portal. This is our only chance to do this.
Better make it count.
Oh, great. YOU again.
I was about to say the same thing about you. Your attempts to reach this portal will prove futile.
Not if I have anything to say about it.
This is going to be even more fun than beating up a dozen pathetic versions of you, Scott.
Wait, what?
As long as we take out the last of Vision's scientists, we can reverse the process and save the micro-Earth.
I was going with "mini-Earth" but "micro-Earth" works, too.
Evil Wasp is trying to force the portal closed before we can get to it!
Take out those operators, and we still have a fighting chance.

We need to focus on those operators. No time to waste.

Stasis field disabled. The shrinking process is reverting...
Confirmed. The planet formerly known as micro-Earth is stable and back to its normal size.
Roger that.\nClosing the portal off for good.
Hey Hope, you were right. Doing the right thing DOES feel good.
Maybe there's hope for you yet, Scott.
Hold on. What's that in your hand?\nIs that the Eiffel Tower?
No. I mean... maybe? Fine. Yes.
Hey, Commander! Groot's gone missing. I'm rounding up a search party.
I need to grab some S.T.R.I.K.E. guys for backup. Thanks.
Last place he was seen was some backwater Ravager planet.
I'm going to start there by roughing up some of the locals.
ROCKET'S <color=#fff568>BASIC ABILITY</color>\n HITS A TARGET AND <color=#fff568>ALL ADJACENT TARGETS</color>.
USE HIS <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color>\nTO <color=#fff568>ATTACK ALL</color> FOR MASSIVE DAMAGE.
Hey, Ravager! WHERE'S GROOT?
Your tree friend passed through here a while ago. Sounded like he was trying to make himself scarce.\nAnd fast.
Then some crazy robot charged in and took off with him.
Ultron? What does Ultron want with Groot?
OK, bucket of bolts. Hand over my friend, and no one gets their spark plugs pulled.
Your alien friend developed a rare fungus I plan on augmenting to my needs.
Fungus? Your wiring's messed up, Toaster Head. Groot's NOT sick.
Negative. The fungus is highly contagious. It is why he went into seclusion.
If Groot's sick, we've got to help him. Hand him over.
Your threats are inconsequential.\nI tire of them.
Fine then. Disassembly time.
Where are you holding Groot?
He is guarded by an army of my drones.
You will never reach him.
We'll see about that.
What's this you say about Groot being sick?
The tree alien was hiding because he did not want to contaminate anyone.
I intend to mutate the fungus to destroy humanity.
Not a fan of ANY of that!
Now where is he?
Guarded by my Ultron army. There is no way to save him.

PROTECT <color=#fff568>GROOT</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.

USE SCARLET WITCH'S <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color>\nTO <color=#fff568>REDISTRIBUTE</color> HEALTH AMONGST HER ALLIES.
USE HER <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> TO PROLONG THE LENGTH OF <color=#fff568>NEGATIVE EFFECTS</color> ON <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color>.

GAH!

What does that mean?

As the Nexus Being, the depths of your mind hold great strength.
Prepare to face its power!
I saw... myself, but as something called the Nexus Being.
There are tomes at the Sanctum Sanctorum that can tell us more.
I've been doing research on the Nexus Being, and if the legend is true, the chosen person is to guard the Nexus of All Realities.
What is the Nexus of All Realities?
A realm where one can manipulate all space and time. Access to that realm, which can only be found in our dimension, is what Ultimus seeks.
As for why you were chosen to guard it, I'm not sure. We need to find out more.
Mordo used to speak of the Nexus Being, and I believe the last one to hold the title was the Ancient One.
Mordo may hold the answers we seek.
Why have you come here, Strange?

Tell us what you know about the Nexus Being.
The Ancient One was the last one.\nIt is the defender of the M'Kraan Crystal.
My master told me that the crystal is the key to protecting the Nexus of All Realities. How exactly, is still a mystery to me.
You will likely find the crystal amongst the ruins of the planet Birj.
Is it true she is the chosen one?
We'll find out soon enough.
The M'Kraan Crystal seems to be in this temple on planet Birj.
How has it been kept safe here all this time?
Mordo warned us the entrance to the temple was heavily fortified by the Ancient One to ensure it would be safe.
If you truly are the Nexus Being, you will have the power necessary to clear the path to the crystal.
Time to put my new powers to the test.
Be gone. This temple is protected by the Nexus Being.
Lucky for you, I'm the Nexus Being. Let us pass?

Pocket dimensions filled with mystical spirits of immeasurable power.
Lovely.
These are the manifestations of all our fears.
Wanda, stop this foolish quest.\nJoin me once more...

Magic has a way of choosing the owner.
All we can do is embrace what comes our way.
Easy for you to say. You got a cape with a mind of its own.

You are spirits, nothing more.\nYour words mean nothing to me.
What will we find next, Strange?
No idea. We're in uncharted territory here.
Do we know what the M'Kraan Crystal has to do with the Nexus of All Realities?

If I truly am the Nexus Being, then we will find our answers upon finding the crystal.

Nothing is more important than this...

We must DESTROY it.
Mordo, what is this?
Ultimus can never get the crystal.\nWe must destroy it!

A chance at freedom or certain doom at the hand of Ultimus?\nI choose freedom.
I will protect the M'Kraan Crystal and the Nexus within. You will fail, count on it.
Try as you must.
Cali mon ta ren fooloo belaga...

NO!!!

I am the ONLY one with the will to do what must be done. I did what you could not.

Hey, you! Get away from that convenience store!

Together? We're gonna do a team-up? I love team-ups!

Storm's <color=#fff568>BASIC ABILITY</color> gains <color=#fff568>CHARGE</color> and becomes an <color=#fff568>AREA OF EFFECT</color> attack when charged.
Storm's <color=#fff568>SPECIAL</color>and <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE </color> abilities become more powerful with each <color=#fff568>CHARGE</color> generated.

Scans confirm you're now infected with the Legacy Virus.

I can seal off Ultimus's portal to this plane. Go now!
If I am infected by the Legacy Virus, does that put the rest of the team at risk?
Negative. Wolverine and Deadpool are safe because of their rapid healing factor, and I was vaccinated for this strain in my timeline.
In my future, we discovered the cure in another dimension. Inoculation was standard procedure.
So the cure might exist in that dimension today?
Possibly. Keep in mind, my future no longer exists. The invasion of Ultimus has changed everything forever.
But that dimension is our best bet. Especially considering the fact that you're already infected.

If I can get to the mainframe, I may be able to recover the formula.
Lookin' forward to making the First Legion bleed again.

That's the last of them for now, but more will come. There are always more.
Hacking into the mainframe. Stand by.
Confirmed. I've pieced the formula back together. Let's move.
We now have the formula needed to generate a cure, but our window of time is short. We're counting hours here, not weeks.
What do we need?
A sample of the virus, a rare batch of plasmids, and a set of Pym Technologies nanites programmed to target the virus.
Well, I have the virus for you.\nWhat about the rest?
I've tracked down a likely location for the plasmids we need. It's in an Ultimus-controlled armory in another conquered dimension.
Then that is where we shall begin our search.
Rocket, what should we do with these intruders?
Blast 'em, obviously.
The modified plasmids are locked away in this armory. Hang in there, Storm.
I won't give up. Anything to save our people.
Scans indicate a heavy presence of corrupted S.H.I.E.L.D. soldiers inside the armory.
Ultimus must realize the importance of these plasmids in being able to cure the Legacy Virus.
Can't say I'm happy about the idea of taking down Fury's crew, but there ain't nothin' we can do about it.
This entire war is banking on us making the cure so all Mutants can help in this fight more effectively.
Time to show Ultimus the error of his ways.
Stand down. Hand us the plasmids, and you will be spared.
You think you scare us? You're not looking so good there, Mutant...
Enough talking.
Plasmids secured. Once we have the Pym Technologies nanites, we can generate the cure to the Legacy Virus.
How much time do I have left?
Not much. A few hours at most before the virus puts you down for good.
Wasp, do you have the nanites we need to keep Ororo from pushing daisies?
Sadly, no. They were stolen months ago by Ultimus.
Thankfully, I DO know where to find them.
Months back, Ultimus sent one of my corrupted doppelgangers to infiltrate one of my labs and steal the nanites.
I had a tracking device on the box containing the nanites, and I can confirm the stash is being stored in a corrupted lab nearby.
We've been using the tracker to gain intel on their operations.
Good, we can take out two birds with one stone. Grab the nanites, then I can generate the cure in the lab for Storm.
I will help create a path for you to get inside.
You sure you're up for this?
Even if you run out of time to make the cure for me, it will still be made in time for the rest of our people. I will make sure of that.
Hey, you aren't authorized to enter this facility! Deadpool, take them out, chop chop!
With pleasure!
We're close now... I can feel it.
Hold on, Ororo.\nWe're one step closer to the cure.
The nanites are being held in storage here in the warehouse.
Reinforcements incoming!
Let them come. We shall see if they can handle a little rain...
And 300 kilovolts of lightning.
You're after the nanites? Oooooh, you're trying to make a cure for the Legacy Virus. How interesting!
Step aside, or you're getting a crash course in meteorology.
Nanites secured. We need to get to the lab, quickly. We only have minutes left before the virus takes down Storm.
It will take me a few minutes to synthesize the cure.
I'll coordinate from the lab while our S.H.I.E.L.D. Operator activates the centrifuges in the needed sequence.
We'll give you the time you need.
Even if I fall... You will make that cure. You must!
Fools, can you not see? Making a cure for the Legacy Virus is meaningless. You will never make it out of this facility alive.
I may not survive, but others will... Mutants have survived worse than the likes of you.
Activating primary centrifuge.

Sequencing is progressing optimally. Halfway there.
2 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.

Sequencing complete. We've got a full batch of the cure ready to go here.
Ororo, take this quickly.
Thank you, Logan.
I can feel the effects of it working already. My full strength will return in time.
Others have been afflicted for longer than I. We must get the cure to them.
<color=#fff568>MEANWHILE... UP IN ORBIT</color>

That was fun.

And these are loyal to Ultimus.
We know where they came from. There's an Ultimus-controlled technocracy run by Trask Industries.
Pyro, I think we've found a task \nthat you'd be particularly \nwell-equipped to handle for the good of all mutant-kind.
Burn, baby, burn?
Precisely.
Eliminate the mutant. Protect the inventory.
G'day, mates. Well, robot mates.
Don't mind me, just here to barbecue you all and burn your warehouse down to ashes.
Nothing personal.
Pyro excels at applying <color=#fff568>BLEED</color> and <color=#fff568>DISRUPTED</color> while also removing <color=#fff568>POSITIVE EFFECTS</color> from enemies.
All of Pyro's abilities deal <color=#fff568>MAJOR DAMAGE</color> to\n a <color=#fff568>PRIMARY</color>  target and <color=#fff568>ALL ADJACENT</color> targets.
What's this now?\nMagneto sent me to handle this on my own.
S.T.R.I.K.E. intends to provide you with additional assets to complete this mission more effectively.
Alright then, if you insist.
Pyro is a key member of the <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color> team who becomes especially lethal when paired with Magneto.
I could have handled that on my own just fine, thank you very much.
I'm sure you could have.
Vis, I'll take it from here. Thanks for helping find him before he managed to incinerate all our possible leads.
So Nick Fury didn't trust good ol' Pyro to handle the job on his own, huh?
Can you blame him? Everything you look at goes up in an inferno!
Fury asked me to bring\n a squad of S.T.R.I.K.E.'s best\n Blasters and Support to assist.
If we want to stop the Prime Sentinels, we must trace the evidence to its source and capture the one responsible for the program.
Fair enough.
So why'd he send you?\nWhat makes you so special?
Well, you like to burn things, right? \nI can help make that \nfire burn brighter.
You know... I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship.
Apparently, this A.I.M. facility is a proxy of this dimension's conglomerate technocracy, Trask Industries.
I have no idea what you just said.
Melt these Prime Sentinel guards into paste, then we can search the area for clues.
Roger that.
Now we can begin the scavenger hunt!\nI love me a good party game.
You are a very strange man.
We find anything of worth?
The tech found here originates from an old Trask Industries facility.
There's a good chance we will find the Prime Sentinels project lead there.
Hold that thought, Scarlet Witch. We've got company.
You dare steal my precious Prime Sentinel prototypes?
Hand over what's left of them, or there will be HELL TOUPEE...
Geez, you really had to work hard to work that one in, didn'cha?
My algorithm determined that joke to be a 99.52% match for you. SCIENCE!
The Trask Industries headquarters is up ahead. Expect heavy resistance.
My fuel tanks are full up.\nLet's light this bonfire!

Much of the Prime Sentinel
technology has been developed
at the Trask Industries
headquarters up ahead.
If we can disable some of their patrol units, they should be able to help us infiltrate the facility.
By disable you mean DON'T burn them beyond recognition, right?
Yes.
No worries.
Anomaly detected. Mutant presence confirmed. Destroy.
Good luck with that one, mate.
Iron Man! What are you doing here?
I saw you taking on the Prime Sentinels. Perhaps I can be of assistance.
To think that Tony Stark would show up and help out old Pyro. I can't wait to tell me mates about this one!
Tony Stark? That buffoon? You think he's Iron Man? HAH!
Only someone with\nmy determination and intellect\ncould possibly be Iron Man.
Okay, who are ya then?
I am Bolivar Trask.
Wait, you're Iron Man in this dimension? I thought you founded Trask Industries. You HATE mutants!
Surprisingly, everything you\njust said is true.
However, Ultimus managed to infiltrate my company with his operatives. He stole my creations,\nmy world out from under me.
I will stop at nothing to take back what is mine, even if I must ally myself with the likes of... you.
The enemy of my enemy is my friend...
Something like that.
Works for me!\nOnward and upward, then.
If we can get to the main server farm, I'll be able to gain root access to the Prime Sentinel project archives.
From there, I'll be able to get you information you need to find the project architect.
I never get tired of doing that...\nTrask, the path is clear!
Indeed.
It appears that the project lead is a dangerous android by the name of Ultron. He's a real piece of work.
That he is.
In addition, I've uncovered all the information needed to take back my company.
The Kree technology being used in the Prime Sentinels proves the conspiracy that an alien invasion infiltrated the global technocracy.
The scandal of the Prime Sentinel program will force out all of Ultimus's pawns.
Trask Industries will have no choice but to appoint me as CEO once again.
Good on ya. I take it you don't mind if we finish the job and torch the last of the Prime Sentinel factories?
Of course. They must be destroyed.
Until we meet again...
Trask was helpful, but it's hard to trust someone like him.
Agreed, but we can burn\nthat bridge another day.
Speaking of which, looks like a First Legion Helicarrier is approaching.
Prepare yourself.
Surrender now, mutants. Your kind is ill-equipped to fight the First Legion.
Try me, mate.
It never gets any easier fighting fallen friends...
Maybe. Though giving Deadpool a good walloping never hurts the spirit.
Sometimes I think he likes it.
The central Prime Sentinel facility is up ahead.
Good.\n\nI will bring Magneto a great victory.
I've never understood the appeal of Magneto to members of the Mutant Brotherhood.
What is it you see in him?
He's always looked out for our kind, no matter what. Almost like\na father figure, ya know?
Quite a family.
Defenders deployed. Targeting systems locked. Eliminate the mutants.
I'm gonna melt you like a wax candle.
Apex Hunters up ahead.\nWe need to be extra cautious.
What are these Apex Hunters you keep talking about?
The cream of the crop.\nPrime Sentinels of the highest degree. Extremely dangerous.
What makes them so dangerous?
Kree cybernetics, Trask programming,\nspliced with Symbiote DNA--
Imagine what S.T.R.I.K.E. could accomplish with that technology.
We will destroy you. Mutants. Abominations. Destroy.
Focus on Venom. Taking him down will disable his Symbiotic connection to the rest, rendering them inactive.
Got it.
Venom is down! Look at the rest of 'em drop like flies. Beauty...
Ultron and his bodyguards are inside. We must move quickly before he can escape.
Can't be havin' that.
Ultron's gonna be a tough target. Especially with Prime Sentinel elites guarding him.
Considering the situation, I think now's the time to take off the training wheels, Pyro.
Time to let it go.
So, roasted and toasted,\nNOT beaten and broken?
Ideally, yes.
Hello there, Ultron.\nIn the mood for a hot date?
Show me what you've got, mutant peon.
Rude.
That's it for you, mate. Surrender now or I'll melt you into slag.
You may have defeated me, but the Prime Sentinel program will live on.
There is no stopping the program. Ultimus will just spin up more and more factories throughout the multiverse.
Without his precious android running the show? I don't think so.
This project is being permanently put on ice... Well, really, really hot ice. Made of fire.
Nice.
Colonel Rhodes -- S.T.R.I.K.E.'s recent attacks on Ultimus's key outposts have been effective.
We've gotten reports that Ultimus is beginning to change his tactics.
Punisher and Gamora went in with a S.H.I.E.L.D. team to learn more, but we lost radio contact with them. Situation's looking grim for them.
Make your way to their last known position ASAP and find out what happened to them.
Consider it done. Hopefully we can get to them in time.
Don't think you're going on this suicide mission without me, Rhodey.
What would I ever do without you, Tony?
You'd probably be flying a desk. You're welcome.
This looks like our last stand, Gamora.\nI gotta say, you're a hell of a fighter.
If we fall here, know this: I'm taking out more of these drones than you, human.
War Machine! You flyboys always show up at the last minute.
You missed your radio check. I figured you'd need some air support.
Let's mop up this mess.
WAR MACHINE EXCELS AT DAMAGING MULTIPLE ENEMIES AT ONCE. HIS <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> DOES MORE DAMAGE FOR EACH <color=#fff568>HERO ALLY</color> ON THE FIELD.
WITH IRON MAN ON HIS SIDE, WAR MACHINE DOES BONUS CRITICAL DAMAGE AND HIS <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> WILL DO AN EXTRA ATTACK.
WAR MACHINE'S  <color=#fff568>PASSIVE ABILITY</color> CAN APPLY <color=#fff568>TAUNT</color> WHEN ENEMIES HAVE LOW HEALTH.
Punisher, situation report?
It looks like Ultimus is staging a rally point for his Helicarriers.
So he's got a few Helicarriers... what's the big deal?
They've been equipped with some new tech. It's being developed in a lab in Dimension 925-L4. Ultimus is devoting a lot of resources to it.
Sounds like trouble. Let's check it out.
Listen up. The research is being done out of a Hydra laboratory here. The lab is guarded by Hydra and Ultron drones--
Do we really need a briefing on this? Go in, blow stuff up, get info, get out.
What? Oh, come on! That's what we do, right?
Fair enough. Let's roll.
Whoa, look at this place. Bio-mechanical computers... Those aren't something the Kree usually use.
Eyes up, we have hostiles to deal with.
My scans show traces of Oz formula in this tissue. Did Norman Osborn really help create this?
Ol' Normie must be smarter in this dimension.
Sounds like we have a new target. Let's move out!
Alright people, listen up.
Our target is a corrupted Norman Osborn, also known as the Green Goblin.
Osborn appears to be the mastermind behind this bio-mechanical computing system we found.
We need to bring him in for interrogation.
No witty response, Tony?
Sorry, I was texting Pepper... Probably a bad idea, actually.
The roaming data fees are gonna be brutal.
Eliminate the hostiles to flush out Osborn.
Brains and Brawn... You'll need more than that to stop Ultimus...
We prefer to be called Beauty and the Beast.
Thank you, Tony. I am dangerously handsome.
Nice, Rhodey. BEAST MODE ACTIVATE!
Norman -- we have some questions for you.
We can do this the easy way...
Or I can use my nano-extractors to access the information we need. Spill it.
Osborn's interrogation yielded some disturbing news, Director.
Is there any other kind these days? What did you find?
Corrupted Osborn has been working with an Ultron to develop the bio-mechanical computer systems.
Even worse, the bio-mechanical systems are susceptible to Ultimus's corruption.
Oh, and let's not forget the fact that Ultimus has been outfitting his Helicarriers across the multiverse with this tech.
We are getting a handle on the bio-engineering side of the systems. But the tech is beyond anything I've seen before.
Then we need to capture their A.I. engineering mastermind, Ultron.
The last thing we need is Ultimus attacking with sentient, corrupted Helicarriers.
I've never met a sentient life form that couldn't be distracted with cat videos.
We have our orders, let's move out.
Okay, seriously, what's so bad about sentient Helicarriers?
Remember the last time you created a sentient robot?
Fair point. Let's capture Ultron.
Organics are always so afraid of upgrades.
I love upgrades!
Then wait until you see the upgrades I have planned for you.
That's just creepy.
Package secured.
Uploading P.L.A.T.O. into ULTRON. We'll get our answers in a hot minute...
Awaiting your command.
We need to create a worm that disables the bio-mechanical systems. Can you do that?
Processing...
Encoding worm...
Tony, what is the situation?
Worm creation is still ongoing. We will need to upload it to Ultimus's Helicarrier defense grid.
Where's the defense grid located?
Inside one of the Helicarriers.
Then let's escort our robot friend to the upload center.
Form a perimeter around Ultron while he compiles.
I am capable of simultaneously defending myself and creating the worm.
That's my boy.
Sector secured. What's the status of the worm?
The worm is ready for deployment.
Ultron, are you ready to upload the worm?
Affirmative.
Commander, we should expect heavy resistance. Ultron is going to be their prime target.
We need to keep him safe at all costs.
Keep Ultron safe, team.
I am capable of multi-tasking,\nJames Rhodes.
Then... multi-task your titanium alloy heart out. Just don't overheat.
Bio-mechanical system... halted.
1 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
Corruption nullified.
2 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
Replication systems-- offline.
3 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
Ultron's down!
Worm successfully deployed. Bio-mechanical systems crashing across all upgraded Helicarriers.
The bio-masses used to house the systems are withering and dying.
That's one way to stop the spread of the corruption.
We have eliminated the sentient Helicarriers.
Unfortunately, thousands of conventional S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarriers remain poised to invade your home dimension.
War Machine, what's the situation there?
Corruption of bio-mechanical, sentient Helicarriers has been nullified.
Boy, that was a mouthful...
Sounds like a successful mission then.
That part was.
Am I about to hear a "but" here?
But-- unfortunately, thousands of conventional S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarriers remain poised to invade our home dimension.
The Helicarriers may be normal, but the crews who operate them are still corrupted.
A corrupted Nick Fury is overseeing the Helicarrier deployment.
We don't have the resources to repel thousands of Helicarriers, sentient or otherwise.
Then we need to slow them down. We know how their gates work... maybe there's a chance.
Make your way to the Helicarrier staging location. Find some way to disable that massive dimensional portal. We need to buy time.
We are nearing the dimensional portal.\nThis is gonna be a furball, Tony.
We've gotta act fast. The Helicarriers may be normal, but the crews who operate them are still corrupted.
Nicely done, but scans indicate the dimensional portal is securely locked open.
With a few mods, I can upload the worm to the lead ship before it passes through. It'll spread to the whole fleet from there.
Tony-- time to rig the Ultron worm to affect ships passing through the dimensional portal.
On it. Not sure this thing can spread fast enough to stop the thousands of Helicarriers already on the move...
Their countermeasures are trying to boot the worm. I hate to say it, but I'm out of ideas.
If you hack their navigation systems the gate will send those carriers off course! Can you do it, Tony?
Yes, Rhodey. Yes, I can. Good thinking, bud.
What can I say? I'm more than just a flying arsenal of tactical explosives. Fun as that is.
Colonel Rhodes, Mr. Stark...\nWe anticipated this possibility.
I'm encrypting the gates to counter your worm at this very moment.
Then let me give you something else to think about. Rhodey? Light him up.
Way ahead of you.
Guess they... didn't SEE that coming?
Because his name is Vision?
Yeah...
Every day I get a better understanding of why you wouldn't cut it in the military.
I'm too smart.
The corrupted Fury commanding the fleet is up ahead. Controls for the dimensional portal are here.
If we can desynchronize their navigation systems, they could end up in any random dimension.
If we're lucky, it will take them months to find their way back. Ultimus will have to attack with the few Helicarriers he has left.
That will give our Fury the time he needs to rally a defense.
None of this matters if we don't scramble those nav systems!
You're too late. This fleet carries the corrupted heroes of a thousand dimensions! Your world falls today.
We'll see about that...
Alright, Fury's down. I'll never get used to fighting friendly faces.
Those Helicarriers could have ended up in any parallel universe. Let's hope they can't find their way back quickly.
Some Helicarriers are still gonna make it through when they fix the gate, but we bought ourselves some time.
And the dimensional portal's been permanently reduced in size. A little surprise software update from Vision.
At least they won't be as deadly, and we know they're coming.
You've done all you can. Report back. We have to rally some allies.
Ultimus is moving to the next stage of his invasion.
He once sought to conquer Earth intact, but we have stopped him so far. His next assault will devastate our world.
Ronan, S.T.R.I.K.E. has helped restore the Supreme Intelligence and liberate your homeworld, Hala. Now we need your help to save Earth.
Very well. You have my attention.
S.T.R.I.K.E. forces from dimensions beyond the reach of Ultimus are willing to rally to our defense, but we need a way to get them here.
I need you to gather your best Kree commandos to help us improve our own trans-dimensional gate technology.
Kree technology will save your people and Kree wrath will smite our enemies.
Korath, find Minn-Erva. She leads our forces in the conflict at Nidavellir.\nHer bio-tech expertise is needed immediately.
It will be done.
Focus your fire! Don't let that First Legion scum flank us!
Advance! No mercy for traitors!
USE MINN-ERVA'S BASIC ABILITY TO APPLY <color=#fff568>BLEED</color> TO AN ENEMY TARGET AND APPLY <color=#fff568>REGENERATION</color> TO THE MOST INJURED ALLY IN HER SQUAD.
MINN-ERVA IS A HIGHLY EFFECTIVE HEALER. <color=#fff568>KREE ALLIES</color> GAIN ADDITIONAL BENEFITS LIKE EXTRA ABILITY ENERGY.

Korath, what are you doing here?! There are fifty more traitors over that ridge!
There were. I ended them.
Well done, Korath. Hold your ground while I heal you.
HER <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> WILL HEAL THE MOST INJURED ALLY, AS WELL AS <color=#fff568>REVIVE</color> A FALLEN ALLY.
HER <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> APPLIES <color=#fff568>BLEED</color> AND DRAINS HEALTH FROM ENEMIES TO HER ALLIES, APPLYING <color=#fff568>REGENERATION</color>.
It has been too long since we last fought side by side, Minn-Erva.
Indeed it has. Tell me of Ronan's latest demands.
Doctor Minn-Erva! The traitors have regrouped and are attacking the city!
I guess we'll have to discuss this later, Korath. Ready yourself.
What is happening here, Minn-Erva?
The First Legion traitors are on the march. It's as if they are preparing for a large scale operation.
They are. Ultimus has commenced his Helicarrier invasion on Earth.\nRonan seeks your aid in gathering a fleet of our own.
Damn! Then our forces must withdraw. Help me protect our people as they evacuate.
We'll hit them hard so our forces have time to withdraw.
A victory here will cripple their command structure and protect our allies.
Our job is done here. The fleet has completed preparations for a jump to Earth, where they can aid in its defense.
And we go to Hala. Ronan will be waiting.
We must contact allies of consequence in dimensions untouched by Ultimus and\nbring them to Earth.
The Supreme Intelligence has provided us with the schematics for a Fractal Replicator.
A device of that scale would allow the humans to build gates large enough to transport S.T.R.I.K.E. Helicarriers from other dimensions.
With enough allies untainted by Ultimus, we may stand\na fighting chance of stopping his invasion of Earth.
Could you calibrate such a gate to pierce the veil and reach the correct dimension?
I believe so, but we'll also need a power source capable of stabilizing a trans-dimensional portal.
We will need a reliable source of Phlogistone. Our stockpiles\nwere raided when Ultimus first attacked Hala.
Then we will take back what is ours.
Corrupted forces have a large stockpile of Phlogistone being kept under lock and key in a bunker up ahead.
If we can quietly take care of local patrols, we can get to the stockpile before they try to destroy it.
Quiet or not, these heathens will ALL face swift judgment for their misdeeds.
Doctor. Accuser.
Step aside. Before my nanobots dissolve your body into a puddle of enchanted goo.
Keep dreaming, blue. Ain't nothing you can do to stop me.
These patrols appear to have alerted the bunker to our presence.
We need to get in there fast before they set the whole place to blow.
The Phlogistone is being held on sublevel 18.
What happens if they attempt to destroy the Phlogistone before we can secure it?
If the ore becomes unstable, it can cause degenerative effects such as obsession, megalomania, and psychosis. It may also explode.
Concerns for the weak-minded. Forward!
Stay back. Or we WILL destroy this Phlogistone! For the glory of Ultimus!
We must focus our attacks on their operators. Only then can we protect the stockpile from becoming unstable.
Focus on their operators, we cannot risk a rupture in the Phlogistone supply.
1 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
We are running out of time. They are de-stabilizing the Phlogistone cannisters.
2 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
Fools! Focus your attacks on their operators! They must be punished.
3 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
We are too late, take cover! Before they--
The Phlogistone supply is stable. Let's get out of here before reinforcements arrive.
No. Let them come. We are not leaving until every last one of these corrupted Kree heathens has been JUDGED.
Ronan, we cannot stay here! If we do not bring the Phlogistone back in time, Ultimus will overwhelm Nexus Earth and all will be lost.
You must have faith, Doctor. We walk the one true path of the Kree.\nAll will happen as it must.
All traitors of the First Legion will face judgment by my hand.\nThese usurpers must be punished for their crimes.
You all stand guilty of heresy! High treason in the one true Empire of the Kree!
So pronounces - Ronan the Accuser!
Ronan, you're an arrogant jerk\nin every reality.
I am gonna knock that smug look off your face. For Ultimus.
Ronan, we're trapped. They just keep coming...
Then we die well!
Today's your lucky day, Accuser.\nGlad I got here in time.
CAPTAIN MARVEL IS A FORMIDABLE COSMIC SOLDIER. HER <color=#fff568>BASIC ABILITY</color> CHAINS TO MULTIPLE TARGETS, AND SHE GAINS <color=#fff568>CHARGED</color>.
HER <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> TARGETS A SINGLE ENEMY WITH A CHANCE TO REMOVE <color=#fff568>POSITIVE EFFECTS</color>. SHE ALSO GAINS <color=#fff568>CHARGED</color>.
USE HER UNAVOIDABLE <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> TO UNLEASH <color=#fff568>BINARY FORM</color>. SHE REMAINS IN BINARY FORM WHILE <color=#fff568>CHARGED</color>.
Let's get the Phlogistone out of here before the First Legion nukes this place from orbit!
Very well, Captain.
I must return to Earth with the Phlogistone so that Replicator construction can begin.
It will be done in secret in a place where the project will be protected with cloaking.
Good. But we are still no closer to determining the mineral needed for tuning each gate to dimensions untouched by Ultimus.
The Supreme Intelligence believes a Kree once touched by the Celestials has the answer. He may have a connection to such a material.
Of course. A Kree Eternal! And there's only one that we know of that has yet to be corrupted by the likes of Ultimus.
Ard-Con.
Just what we need in our lives...\nMORE Ultimus.
Ok, this is the meeting spot! And... it's crawling with corrupted forces. Great.
Ard-Con must be nearby.\nLet's clear the area.
Those mercenaries have been pursuing me for weeks. No matter how many I crush, they always send more.
Yeah, the other Ultimus wants you bad.\nHe must not like the competition.
Ard-Con is down. We've failed!
Ard-Con, we require your knowledge. The Supreme Intelligence believes you know of a rare Celestial mineral needed to save our dimension.
Have you ever come across a Celestial mineral with a unique dimensional resonance signature?
What you speak of is a mineral created long ago by the Celestial known as Ego.
And there is only one being in the galaxy who's been in close enough contact with Ego to possibly know of where to find such a mineral.
Mantis.
Minn-Erva, I hate to leave you hanging, but the Kree fleet is getting decimated trying to hold the line in orbit around Earth. They need me.
Go. Salvage what you can. Once we find the mineral supply the Replicator needs, we'll return with haste.
Korath tells me that you would know where to find Mantis.
Last I heard, she was helping S.T.R.I.K.E. forces save refugees on the planet Arago-7.\nHope she's okay...
Why the concern?\nIs S.T.R.I.K.E. not protecting her?
Drax is with her. I'm just not sure\nthat lugnut can handle corrupted forces led by Carnage.
Carnage is dumber than a bag of hammers, but he's scary violent.
With Ultimus pulling his strings he could be even more dangerous!
It's okay, Rocket. We're going\nin to extract her.
She'll be safe with us. I promise.
Stay away from me, you monster!\nDon't make me hurt you!
Yes, make ME hurt you!
YOU WILL REGRET NOT JOINING ULTIMUS SOONER... YEESSSS...
Mantis, we're here to help. Let's dispatch this malignant tumor and be done with it.

MANTIS IS A POTENT COSMIC HEALER. AT THE START OF BATTLE, SHE HAS A CHANCE TO GAIN <color=#fff568>CHARGED</color>, WHICH ALLOWS HER <color=#fff568>BASIC ABILITY</color> TO <color=#fff568>STUN</color> AN ENEMY TARGET.
HER <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> HEALS AND APPLIES <color=#fff568>REGENERATION</color> TO ALL ALLIES, WITH CLOSER ALLIES GETTING HEALED FOR HIGHER AMOUNTS.
HER <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE</color> REDISTRIBUTES HEALTH BETWEEN HER AND THE LOWEST HEALTH ALLY. ON TURN, SHE HEALS HERSELF.
Mantis! NO!!!
Thank you for your help, Minn-Erva.\nI am in your debt!
Of course. But WE are the ones who need YOUR help, Mantis.
We need to know about\na rare Celestial mineral that Ego once created.
A mineral with a unique dimensional resonance signature. Do you know of such a mineral?
Ego once bragged about creating a resonant mineral and showed me a sample. I have felt this same resonance on Yondu's homeworld.
It can be found on Centauri-IV.\nThe people there call it Yaka.
Centauri-IV appears to be largely untouched by Ultimus.
Ultimus only cares about Earth. His empire spans many realities, but his forces are slow to conquer other worlds in those dimensions.
If we are lucky, the Yaka mineral quarries will be safe from his forces.
...I feel the presence of corruption on this world.\nPerhaps we are not lucky.
Drax, stay and protect the ship.\nWe will need to leave quickly.
Let them come!\nI WILL PROTECT THIS SHIP\nLIKE NO SHIP HAS EVER BEEN PROTECTED BEFORE.
Well, lookee here. Some fresh faces for us to hand over to Ultimus!
It appears that we are unlucky.
THEY are the unlucky ones, Mantis. Behold the power of Kree nanobots...
Yaka mineral reserve secured.\nWe must load this onto the ship and return to Earth, quickly!
This mineral is astonishing! It is able to resonate to complex information about individual dimensions with fantastic precision and efficiency.
We'll be able to identify the locations of safe dimensions to enter within hours!
Ego was very proud of creating this mineral. It makes me a little sad that he never got the chance to see it used for such good in this universe.
Sometimes a monster CAN create something beautiful. Speaking of which--
Minn-Erva. You have arrived JUST in time. Our fleet grows weaker with every passing hour.
We have created the first gateway. It is hidden in a place called Wakanda.
The Replicator builds more gates as we speak, but the dogs of Ultimus draw near.
Eliminate his scouts before they reveal our plan.
Team, you know what to do. Destroy everything. Leave nothing intact.
We have to protect the facility at all costs. Stop them before they find the gates!
You continue to come and go as you please, Captain.
Sorry for the holdup. Had to recharge. These invading Helicarriers are tough nuts to crack.
How we lookin'?
Gates are constructed and stable. Dimensional signatures are locked in, ready for activation.
Have we made successful contact with any of these dimensions yet?
S.T.R.I.K.E. forces from parallel dimensions are locked and loaded. If this works, we'll have a fleet of allied Helicarriers to face Ultimus.
Activate trans-dimensional portals! Let's show Ultimus what\ntrue unity looks like.
You really came through when it was needed. Well done, Accuser.
I had very little to do with our success. The victories of Minn-Erva, Captain Marvel, Mantis... they bring glory to our alliance.
With the might of a thousand allied dimensions, your planet will be saved and the heretic Ultimus will face the judgment of the Kree.
We bought ourselves another day in the fight, but a new challenge awaits us tomorrow. And the day after that. I'm glad you're on our side.
Incoming fire from the corrupted Helicarrier! Watch your wings, Sam.
Don't sweat it, just another day in the air. Meet me on the deck.
This is the third attack this week. The big blue guy must be getting antsy.
Welcome aboard, boys. I left some of Ultimus's S.H.I.E.L.D. agents for you.
Natasha. I shouldn't be surprised that you managed to sneak 6,000 feet up behind enemy lines.
And yet here we are.

Taking out our guns? Infiltrating the bridge? Is this any way to welcome me and my S.H.I.E.L.D. agents to your dimension?
Oh, I'm sorry. Guess we'll have to roll out the red carpet, then.
FALCON IS A POWERFUL WARRIOR WHO EXCELS AT DEALING MASSIVE AMOUNTS OF DAMAGE TO ENEMIES WHO HAVE MULTIPLE <color=#fff568>POSITIVE EFFECTS</color>

ATTACK!

Smash?

Real big boom. Got it. Can you disable it?
Given how many Iron Men we're dealing with, my less precise talents might be of more use.
I knew you had it in you, Dr. Banner.

With the repulsors removed, we should be able to crash-land the Helicarrier away from the city.

F.R.I.D.A.Y., full power to boosters, we've got to...

--ARGH!

It's really considerate of you to let us beat you here in this back alley, Gobby.
Right where the trash belongs.

I don't give a damn what happens to the Goblin, but I'm ready to lay some hurt on another Spider-Man.

VULTURE IS A FAST BRAWLER WHO SLOWS HIS ENEMIES AND PREYS ON THOSE WEAKENED BY <color=#fff568>NEGATIVE EFFECTS</color>.

Gentlemen.

VULTURE'S <color=#fff568>BASIC ABILITY</color> DEALS BONUS DAMAGE FOR EACH <color=#fff568>NEGATIVE EFFECT</color> ON ITS TARGET.

VULTURE'S <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> DEALS AREA OF EFFECT DAMAGE WHILE APPLYING <color=#fff568>SLOW</color> TO ALL TARGETS AND <color=#fff568>OFFENSE DOWN</color> TO ANY CITY HERO TARGETS.

Ultimus needs that device to arm our fleet. You're not leaving with it.

Time to shake things up!

SHOCKER'S <color=#fff568>BASIC ABILITY</color> DEALS DAMAGE AND THEN APPLIES <color=#fff568>ASSIST NOW</color> TO A RANDOM <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ALLY IF HIS TARGET <color=#fff568>DODGES</color> THE ATTACK.

SHOCKER'S <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> GENERATES ABILITY ENERGY FOR HIMSELF WHILE APPLYING <color=#fff568>OFFENSE UP</color> TO HIMSELF AND TO  <color=#fff568>RANDOM SINISTER SIX</color> ALLIES.
SHOCKER'S <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> ATTACKS PRIMARY AND ALL ADJACENT TARGETS WITH <color=#fff568>PIERCING</color> DAMAGE.
