Tony, we've brought in our very best S.H.I.E.L.D. Medic to run tests on the subjects.
I'll patch you through.
Mr. Stark, analysis of the subjects recovered at the armory shows a new form of Terrigenesis in their systems.
So the Lunatic Legion is turning humans into Inhumans?
No. This is more comprehensive. The process changes the genetic code of someone and makes them into a full-blooded Kree.
And taking control of the Kree Monolith gives them access to a massive cache of Terrigen...
which could make this thing at risk of going global.
Daisy, have you been able to track down the Monolith yet?
I've been scanning the surface of the moon since the Lunatic Legion has been known to operate from there in the past.
It appears a transmission was in fact sent from the armory to the Blue Area of the Moon just before we raided it.
Hey Clint, ever wanted to go take a walk on the moon?
Walk? Not so much.
Always wanted to know how far I could shoot an arrow from there.
Tony, you notice how all these Kree zealots aren't even corrupted?
I guess it's easy to declare loyalty to a guy like Ultimus, who hates humans as much as they do.
A corrupted Yondu? Here? Don't these guys know he's Centaurian and not Kree?
Shows how much you know, tin man. They MADE me into a Kree.
Full-blooded and everything. Now I'm stronger than ever!
You fools. With the Terrigen Crystals in our hands, there's nothing you can do to stop the Grand Design.
Oh, they even have a special name for their terrifying ritual. Nice.
Correct me if I'm wrong, but that lab up ahead sure as heck looks like an A.I.M. lab.
I should have bought that company and fired them all when I had the chance.
Who else would happily make an atmospheric bomb that gives people a case of the Kreebie-Jeebies for a bunch of zealots?
Because science.
Tony! How nice to see you!
Check it out, my very own moon base. What do you think?
Listen up, Nacho Supreme.
Put down the beakers, turn off the Bunsen burners, and hand over your science fair project.
Oh, please. You can't seriously be angry with me?
Everybody needs a little side hustle!
Ok, playtime's over. Cough it up, Craziness Supreme.
I'm sorry to inform you that you arrived here too late.
The Lunatic Legion has already taken the Terrigen Bomb to their warship.
Give me one good reason I shouldn't quarantine you in that airlock.
There's no need for ill manners, \nMr. Stark. It's just science.
Take this vaccine with you. It will likely nullify the cocktail within the bomb.
Hold up... you made a vaccine for a weapon that you gave to Ultimus's cronies?
What kind of a scientist engineers a plague without making a vaccine? \nDo you think I'm insane?
...just hand it over.
Alright, team, no more messing around.
Time to hit 'em where it hurts.
Clint, we've got a Kree warship to assault and a bomb to disable.
Roger that, Tony.
Team, we have orders to keep these guys from the bridge. Make it so.
Huh. Well, now I know how they breached my security protocols.
Friday, make a note to update all my logins to use eight-factor authentication.
Stark, you need to hurry. The ship is approaching Earth's atmosphere.
Working on it.
Friday is telling me that there is a squad of corrupted Avengers protecting the bomb up ahead.
Ready for a doppelganger fight?
Wouldn't have it any other way.
Hey everybody, look! It's Tony Stark, the big brave hero, and he's come to save the day!
Hah! That guy is a dead ringer for you, Tony.
Oh please, I do not sound like that. Wait. Do I?
Not good. They've set the ship on a crash course for the Pacific Ocean.
Tony, get that vaccine into the bomb's viral release cannister before we hit atmo!
Way ahead of you.
Just a twist to the left... and... it's locked in!
It's done. There's nothing else we can do for this ship, time to get out of Dodge!
Hang on tight, Hawkeye. I'll fly you out of here.
Captain Quill, I've got a task that you and your Cosmic allies might be able to help S.T.R.I.K.E. with.
Ultimus is testing a hybrid Odium serum on his soldiers.
It makes them enraged with super strength but with none of the usual weaknesses.
As in, the Odium doesn't eventually kill them after taking it?
Exactly.
That sucks.
I'll pull the crew together.
Hey Korath, back away from the Odium...\nOr else. Cuz Star-Lord's here!
WHO?!
You know what, every Korath I come across says that. Not cool, bro.
And THAT'S what happens when you mess with the Guardians... and Ravagers... of S.T.R.I.K.E.!
I definitely thought that would sound better.
What's the deal with Odium anyway? Why would people drink something like that?
In Kree culture, when a soldier is outnumbered without hope of surviving, they drink Odium.
All strength, no pain. A fearsome last stand. A fitting end for a warrior seeking glory.
That is the stupidest thing I've ever heard! Who the heck kills themselves over something like that?
Typical Kree Noble nonsense.
If it would help protect any of you, I would do it without hesitation.
Dang it, Gamora, why'd you gotta go and say that? You're gonna make me all weepy, you jerk!
This Odium supply belongs to Ultimus. Leave this place, or you will be destroyed.
Do you have tickets yet?
Umm, to what?
To the gun show! Pew pew pew!
Two supply lines down, a whole buttload more to go.
Good. Then there is only a small amount remaining.
Listen up, Robocop. Turn over the Odium and... that giant pile of high-tech assault weapons.
Or what?
Or... We're gonna have a gunfight.
Works for me.
Hi there! You're all trespassing on sacred land belonging to Ultimus. Prepare to die!
Hasselhofftopia remembers!
This is my nightmare.
That... was... AWESOME!
This latest Odium formula is my greatest achievement.
Ultimus WILL have it. We cannot be stopped!
I swear, EVERY time science goes bad, SHE is ALWAYS there.
Tell me about it. I'm just happy corrupted versions of YOU aren't running the show.
Yeah, you'd all be screwed if that ever happened.
Finally, the ultimate test of my strength. If I die today, I know I will have been bested by my superior.
You are a wise and handsome man.
As are you.
Can we PLEASE just start fighting already?
I am GROOT.
Without a doubt! Now all we have to do is find that Odium factory.
Huh. Looks like Ultimus sent Loki to stop us.
You think he'll give a villainous monologue and tell us where Ultimus's Odium factory is located?
Ah, the infamous Star-Lord honors us with his presence.
And his illustrious band of misfits, oh this keeps getting better and better...
Tell you what... You will all be dead soon, so I suppose it doesn't matter.
The Odium factory is housed on a Kree warship in orbit around planet Berhert.
Um... Thanks?
Rocket, put in the coordinates for Berhert. Let's end this.
On it!
That corrupted Loki never mentioned ANYTHING about a corrupted Ultimus AND Thanos guarding the Odium factory.
Well, Peter, that fella was a snake. Seems par for the course to me.
Good talk, Yondu. Good talk.
BOOYAH!
No more Odium for Ultimus! I bet he's gonna cry like a big blue baby.
Fury's gonna love hearing about this...
Thanks to Nick Fury, we have tracked down nearly all the components necessary to resurrect the Supreme Intelligence.
All the more concerning that he's gone missing.
What do you mean? Has Ultimus captured him again?
Unknown. Last contact with Fury was behind enemy lines on planet Kallu.
That area is way too hot for a S.T.R.I.K.E. team. We'd never make it in one piece.
The Kree resistance will find him. Our minions can infiltrate enemy lines without risk of exposure.
It is our duty to track down Fury. Without him, the Supreme Intelligence cannot be brought back online.
Fury landed here on Kallu. We must follow the trail to his last known location.
After we rid this planet of these corrupted Ravagers...
Excellent work, team. Your reputations precede you.
Stop acting like you're running this squad just because you have a cape.
Do we know yet where Fury's trail ends?
Up ahead. Fury's tracks lead into that research facility on the ridge.
Scans indicate a heavy presence of Hydra soldiers guarding the lab.
Time to expel them from one of our worlds. Permanently.
Kree soldiers, you do not have the proper clearance to enter this facility.
Return to your assigned patrol duties, immediately.
You dare give orders to a Kree? Prepare to taste our wrath.
Do we know why Fury came to this facility?
It appears this facility was once run by one of our most-renowned scientists, Zara-Lar.
Perhaps he believes she can help bring back the Supreme Intelligence.
Those Hydra fools were so weak that we did not even need to use our Odium! Disappointing.
Your words strike true. We can only hope our future adversaries are worthy.
Records in the lab indicate that Fury surrendered without a fight and was taken to a Kree Warship for processing.
That is odd. I would have expected him to fell a dozen Hydra scum before capture.
We must assault one of Ultimus's Kree Warships in orbit to learn more.
Details of Fury's current location will be found in the ship's receiving logs.
Wait... You do NOT have the proper clearance codes to board this vessel!
And you do not have the will to serve the true Kree Empire.
Prepare for judgment.
What do the ship's records say about Fury?
He has been taken to Berhert. Ultimus has established a highly fortified prison there.
Then to Berhert we shall go. Saving Fury gives us hope to revive the Supreme Intelligence.
Do we have a path ahead to the prison mapped out?
Scans indicate that Ultimus has stationed S.H.I.E.L.D. patrols throughout the area.
He has S.H.I.E.L.D. forces out here?\nOn Berhert?
Affirmative. This planet holds his maximum security prison. Retrieving Nick Fury from there will be difficult.
A S.H.I.E.L.D. patrol has spotted us.
Not a concern. All I see are more heathens to reduce to ash.
Send word to Ronan. If we are to break Fury out of the prison, we need additional Kree support.
Agreed. I believe there is an optimal choice for the task...
The team's efforts thus far have been admirable.
You honor us, but we have more battles to win.
Nick Fury's cell is heavily guarded by corrupted mercenaries in the prison.
To make matters worse, he is scheduled for conversion within hours.
We cannot fight our way to his cell in time. I propose an alternative approach.
Have Ard-Con pose as Ultimus to get us to Nick Fury's cell with minimal resistance.
Ard-Con, are you up to the task?
It is but one step on the road to my revenge.
Hi there, Ultimus. Would you kindly give me the secret password so I don't have to stab-shoot you for being an imposter?
The password is... "step aside or I will rip you in half."
Incorrect. Prepare for the end, imposter!
Someone sounded the general alarm, and your eyes aren't glowing.
I figure you're here to set me free.
Indeed.
Good to see y'all. Though we can't leave here just yet.
You want to bring back the Supreme Intelligence? Can't do it without saving a Kree scientist named Zara-Lar.
Lucky for you, she's here in this prison.
The whole reason I'm in this prison is because I was searching for Zara-Lar.
The Kree scientist who is the final key to resurrecting the Supreme Intelligence.
When I discovered she'd been taken here, Ultimus's forces were closing in on me and I couldn't risk broadcasting the message to you.
So you let them capture you with the intent of confirming she was here?
Reckless, but bold.\nYour reputation is well earned.
I'm just glad you guys were able to track me down in time.
Let's save Zara-Lar and get out of here before Ultimus gets wind of this.
Halt, prisoner! Fury's out of his cage. Contact the warden!
No time to mess around here, team. Put 'em down quickly so we can get Zara-Lar out.
Zara-Lar, we're here to free you. Ready to bring back the Supreme Intelligence?
Backing up the Supreme Intelligence in case of catastrophe is my life's work.\nOf course.
It is quite impressive how much progress you've made in your efforts to resurrect the Supreme Intelligence, human.
Ultimus is our mutual enemy. We only defeat him as allies.
The data cores were impounded when I was captured. All of the components required are here.
I just need time to bring the system online and upload my primary boot sequence to reference the backup archives of the elders.
We've got your back, but Ultimus has to have gotten wind of our plans by now. Expect heavy resistance forces to intercept.
You dare to revive this false Kree idol? Ultimus is the one and true god of all.
As protector of the Kree resistance, I vow to annihilate you and all corrupted in tribute.
For the Kree!
Preparing initial boot sequence of the Supreme Intelligence.
1 / 4 stages complete.
All systems are green. Upload of archived elders activated.
2 / 4 stages complete.
It's nearly done. Resurrection sequence initiated!
3 / 4 stages complete.
We have failed, Zara-Lar.
The Supreme Intelligence is back online! We've done it!
Good. We finally have the tactical advantage we need to take down Ultimus.
Begin the process of searching for the optimal strategy to defeat him.
Search initiated.
The Supreme Intelligence will remember what you've done, Nick Fury. Be sure of that.
Here's hoping. I almost got converted looking for a way to help save it...
Transfer the Supreme Intelligence to the Space Force destroyer.
I will ensure that they safely reach my stronghold.
Magneto... to say it's a surprise to see you would be an understatement.
Why are you here?
Ororo, the Brotherhood of Mutants requires your help. For the sake of all mutant-kind.
Ok, I'm listening.
When we started this war with Ultimus, I hid Asteroid M\nsomewhere safe. Somewhere that no one would find it.
Unfortunately, it seems that\nAsteroid M has gone missing.
My connection to the asteroid has somehow become severed. I can no longer sense its presence.
If I help you find it, what's in it for us? For S.T.R.I.K.E.?
If you help me recover Asteroid M,\nI vow to unleash my wrath on Ultimus... on your terms.
S.T.R.I.K.E. can work with that.\nI'll gather the team.
Magneto, why the docks?\nWhat's your angle?
First, clear away this rabble, Logan.\nThen you will see.
If we are to find Asteroid M, we must first procure the right form of transportation.
A submarine, in this case.
You never make things easy, Magneto.
A Hydra submarine will get us to our destination efficiently.
Why a Hydra submarine?
I suspected you would be more comfortable with this than stealing a submarine from S.H.I.E.L.D. forces.
Plus--
Nazis?
Nazis.
Listen up, Hydra flunkies!
Give us your sub or Magneto's gonna start pushing coins into your brains like a kid abandoned by his parents at an arcade.
Too soon, boss?
I never tire of toying with these lesser beings.
Enough. We're here for the submarine,\nthat's all.
Indeed. All aboard.
Why the Mariana Trench?
It's the deepest known place on Earth. A place even Ultimus would never notice it.
Or so I had hoped.
Mystique, how much longer until we're there?
The sub is holding together,\nbut we've got problems.
Someone is messing with my controls. It's coming from the engine room.
Time to eliminate the stowaway.
Surrender now or we will sink this submarine permanently.
Not a chance. You will fail just as all of Ultimus's peons have.
Helm controls have been restored.
I'm sensing trace amounts of Gravitonium in the area. That's not right...
Magneto, what's going on here?
It's quite simple, really. Ultimus must have discovered Asteroid M and encased it in a shell of Gravitonium to move it.
A corrupted Quake, I imagine.\nShe must be quite powerful\nto manage that.
A worthy adversary.
That can't be good.\nAre we too late to stop him?
That much gravitonium leaves a lingering trail. I can sense it.
It leads to the southern coast of Japan. We will find out more there.
For Hydra filth, you certainly are persistent.
You cannot steal from us without consequences, Magneto.
We will have our revenge.
But that is exactly what I did. And now YOU will pay the price. Again.
Those guys are always such a useless bunch of knuckleheads.
On the contrary, Marko,\ntheir purpose is quite clear.
They simply lack the ability to stand up to our kind. Strength conquers all.
It appears that Asteroid M passed through here and laid waste\nto the city up ahead.
Such are the losses of war.
The fallen can be avenged once we retake the asteroid.
If Ultimus gains full control of it\nin orbit, there's no telling what\nhe might do with it.
Alpha Flight has a space launch facility nearby in Tanegashima.
If we can fight past these corrupted we can attempt to intercept the asteroid before it reaches orbit.
Very well. We will cut a swathe through the ranks of the First Legion and\nhave our starship.
We must hurry. We cannot risk Ultimus gaining full control of Asteroid M.
Preparing for launch to Alpha Flight Station. Stand by.
Raven, now would be an opportune time for you to infiltrate Alpha Flight station discreetly.
The less warning they have to our presence, the greater our chances of taking control of Asteroid M quickly.
Works for me.
Besides, impersonating a Kree guard is easy for me.
It'll be nice to stay blue for a change.
I'm here for a routine maintenance check. Orders straight from Ultimus.
I AM GROOT.
Fine! We'll do this the hard way!
Engineering deck secured, but I'm not sure it's going to help us any.
How so?
Looks like Ultimus has strapped a bunch of rocket boosters onto Asteroid M.
The rockets are preparing for launch in the main control room. We need to get there now.
If Ultimus gets those rockets going on Asteroid M, corrupted Quake will devastate what's left of Earth's defense forces.
And just as we were starting to rally...
I can help delay the inevitable, but this effort will require all of us mutants banding together to stop Ultimus.
We will all do our part.\nToo much is at stake.
It is unfortunate that a threat as terrible as Ultimus was what it took to bring us all together.
It takes the strength of unity to face an evil as great as this.
Don't forget your promise, Magneto. Once this is over, you do things\nby the book.
In due time.\nWe have a great challenge before us.
You can't stop us. Ultimus will have his victory.  I'll make sure of that.
I sense great power within you, Quake.\nBut you are just a pawn for a weak creature.
And without you, your Operators will not be able to complete their task.
Focus on taking Quake down. Before those Operators can fire up the engines.
1 / 4 stages complete.
Asteroid M's rockets are all online, boot up sequence complete.
2 / 4 stages complete.
The Operators are almost done activating the rockets. Take down Quake. Hurry!
3 / 4 stages complete.
You are too late. There's no way to stop Asteroid M now. Your forces are doomed!
Quake's down.\nWe got this thing in the bag.
Indeed. Try as they might, those rockets will not stop me now.
Asteroid M is once again mine.
And with control of it, I can re-focus my efforts on humiliating Ultimus and his forces on Nexus Earth once again.
By coordinating through S.T.R.I.K.E.,\nof course. As you promised.
Ororo, when I make a promise,\nI keep it.
Until the environment changes again, of course. You understand.
Fury, Ultimus has launched a new attack on my country.
He seeks to destroy the gates and cut us off from our allies.
We put the Hellicarrier portals in Wakanda because you're supposed to be able to handle this kind of thing.
Our defenses are holding, but his forces are attacking with a new ferocity.
My instruments are picking up a presence beyond the normal corruption...
It's a biological element enhancing their power. Something symbiotic.
Hold tight. I'm sending someone with expertise in that particular field.
Just once I wish someone wanted me for my expertise on the best pizza in New York.
THE WAKANDANS ARE A POWERFUL GROUP THAT EXCEL WHEN THEY ARE ALL TOGETHER.
SHURI PROVIDES SUPPORT VIA DEFENSE AND HEALING TO HER FELLOW TEAMMATES.
IF WAKANDANS ARE ON THE FIELD, SHE WILL ALSO PROVIDE THEM WITH <color=#FFF568>CHARGE</color>.
What's up, cousins?
Killmonger. Even in other dimensions you're a rabid dog.
OKOYE IS A FIERCE WARRIOR THAT CAN ASSIST HER FELLOW WAKANDANS WHEN SHE IS CHARGED.
OKOYE'S <color=#FFF568>BASIC ABILITY</color> HAS A CHANCE TO REMOVE A POSITIVE EFFECT FROM AN ENEMY.
Oh no. Ultimus isn't using cells from just any Symbiote to power these troops. He's using Carnage!
How can we stop it?
Theoretically, if we got our hands on our own Carnage Symbiote, I could synthesize an anti-serum. But we'd have to find him first.
If he's that important, Ultimus will be hunting him as well. You'll need my help.
Target acquired. Moving in on Carnage now.
You meatbags think you can get the drop on us, huh?
Let's see what your fancy uniforms look like once they're torn to shreds.
I can't believe this is the guy we have to save.
Spider-sap! Hang tight, we'll slice and dice you as soon as we're through with them.
Oh, and you brought a friend for us to play with!
Ugh, are all of your enemies so ridiculous?
Shocker's funny, but not in a "laughing with him" way.
DEFEAT THE <color=#fff568>ENEMY OPERATORS</color> BEFORE THEY KIDNAP CARNAGE.
1 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
If the Operators open that portal, they'll escape with Carnage!
2 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
Their portal is halfway open!
3 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
We need to stop the Operators! Their portal is almost open!
4 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
They've opened the portal and taken Carnage. We're too late...
These pathetic dime-store knock-offs are an embarrassment!
As soon as we find this Ultimus guy, we're going to rip him to a thousand pieces for making us look bad.
I think this hideous goop monster just agreed to help us.
Okay, I compared the corrupted Symbiote cells to our Carnage's cells.
There's some technological component in there though... I can't tell what it is.
It's from Ultimus's Conversion Engine. I've never seen it firsthand before.
Can you shut it down?
Of course I can. I said I've never seen it before, not that I didn't understand it.
If you get me to the device creating these monsters, I can reverse engineer it.
A massive building in the middle of the Arctic. This must be the place.
The facility is here. We can sense it!
The army of Carnage-powered guards was also a subtle hint.
Shuri, have you noticed anything weird about this round of Ultimus's twerps?
The amount of strength they're displaying - that energy output needed cannot be sustained. They're burning out.
We're too much power for these chumps!
The Conversion Engine weakens the willpower of anyone it corrupts. That's how we've been able to fend off the army of Ultimus so far.
With the Symbiote's will corrupted, both the host and the Symbiote eventually become too weak to survive. It's a death spiral.
My Kimoyo beads are scanning the facility. There are massive lifesigns in the next room.
Hello! I am Mantis. Nice to meet you! Prepare to die.
Sorry, did no one tell you? All insect and arachnid themed heroes are on "Team S.T.R.I.K.E." now. So, you can just let us go.
I sense humor! Masking great sadness.
Oh, I'll give him something to be sad about...
This oddly friendly Mantis woman is coaxing the Symbiotes into undergoing Ultimus's experiments.
If we stop her, no more Symbiotes will be forced to join Ultimus!
I spent most of my life in Wakanda, and now I am in the Arctic surrounded by aliens.
Yeah, sorry about that. Occupational hazard.
Are you joking? This is the coolest day of my life!
This looks like a modified Conversion Engine. There's a canister for containing raw Symbiotes.
I'll scan it for analysis. That will help my team back at Mount Bashenga reverse the effects.
If I can just adjust the circuits controlling beta particle flow...
Then I'll be able to shut down the nanospore sequencing...
And we can disable this irritating device for good!
You know, Your Highness, we make a pretty good team.
Enough! If we don't get to shred something soon, we're going to join Ultimus!
Princess! I have arrived. Witness as my strength turns the tide!
Woah, who's this guy?
M'Baku. He's extremely extra.
M'BAKU IS A POWERFUL PROTECTOR THAT GAINS BLOCK CHANCE THE MORE <color=#FFF568>CHARGE</color> HE HAS.
IF A TARGET DODGES M'BAKU'S <color=#FFF568>BASIC ABILITY</color>, M'BAKU WILL GET A BONUS ATTACK.
DEFEATING ENEMIES WITH M'BAKU'S <color=#FFF568>ULTIMATE</color> ALLOWS HIM TO CHAIN TO ADJACENT TARGETS.
Ha! The machine is down. Sometimes I even impress myself.
I've got the data needed to make the anti-serum. No more Carnage, finally!
Uh, present company excepted.
Oh, you're not getting rid of us! And now that we've dealt with those posers, we can settle our score with you.
Calm down, crazy! S.T.R.I.K.E. already saved your life. We're not going to hurt you now.
As much as I hate to say it, we still need your help.
Little sister! Ultimus has launched another assault! I need you to return to Wakanda at once.
Big brother! Our mission was a success.
You have returned just in time. We are receiving a transmission from Ultimus.
Ruler of Wakanda! I have allowed your continued existence for too long.
If you won't bow to my will, my amplified First Legion will take your country - and your portals - for me.
You are not the first warlord to try and take my kingdom. You will fail as they did.
Is your anti-serum ready?
I guess we're about to find out.
Surrender to the might of Ultimus!
If we subdue them, we can administer the anti-serum.
If I did the math right then this dose should set off a chain reaction. Free one batch of Carnage Symbiote cells, and their telepathic bond will free them all.
Then Ultimus is out of options.
Whatever powers the Symbiotes were granting the First Legion are failing them. The anti-serum worked!
Phew. It was like... a 50/50 shot that was going to work. Maybe 60/40.
Was that all Ultimus has got? I don't understand, why were all of you so worried about him?
I do not think the fight is over yet.
You've left me no choice, little panther. I would have added your technology and people to my legions.
But instead... my Pyros will burn it to the ground. So says Ultimus!
Not today! Wakanda forever!
Wakanda forever!
Sorry. I got carried away.
Everyone gets one. Don't worry, it was only mildly embarrassing.
Now let's make Ultimus regret ever coming to Wakanda!
Look at all the luscious jungle.
Time to turn it to ash!
KILLMONGER IS A LETHAL ASSASSIN WHO DRAINS HEALTH FROM ENEMIES AND ELIMINATES WEAKENED TARGETS.
KILLMONGER'S <color=#FFF568>PASSIVE</color> ALLOWS HIM TO ATTACK THE MOST INJURED ENEMY WHEN HE GAINS <color=#FFF568>DEFENSE UP</color>.
THE MORE <color=#FFF568>CHARGE</color> KILLMONGER HAS THE GREATER HIS CRIT CHANCE IS.
The jungle is burning! Fall back!
It is over. Wakanda is safe.
Your Highness. Portals are secure, and Helicarrier reinforcements are pouring in from other dimensions.
Ultimus is retreating.
With his tail between his legs.
He's out of Symbiotes, we took down his elite First Legion troops...\nI'm beginning to think we might just win this thing.
Was there ever any doubt?
Another wave of Ultimus's forces down...
Only 'nother few hundred to go.
My ninja are... regrouping... around the enemy...
Elektra, you're in no shape to fight. Fall back and rest.
X-Men? Back into battle.
If this is to be our final stand,\nit will be together!
You can't hold out forever, especially now that we have our own mutant firepower.
Prepare to fall, X-Men.
The force from earlier... I can feel it! It's here!
My friends. I've returned.
Jeanie? Where the hell have you been?
Answers later, Logan. We have a fight to finish.
PHOENIX IS A POWERFUL CONTROLLER WHO EXCELS AT DEALING DAMAGE, PROTECTING ALLIES, AND CLEARING <color=#fff568>POSITIVE EFFECTS</color> FROM ENEMIES

PHOENIX'S <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> APPLIES <color=#fff568>STEALTH</color> AND <color=#fff568>DEFENSE UP</color> TO ALL ALLIES, REDISTRIBUTES HER HEALTH TO ALL ALLIES AND TRANSFERS <color=#fff568>NEGATIVE EFFECTS</color> FROM THEM TO HERSELF.
UPON DEATH, PHOENIX'S <color=#fff568>PASSIVE ABILITY</color> SUMMONS DARK PHOENIX.
Red, you are a sight for sore eyes.
I'm so glad to see all of you. I've been lost for so long.
But now I'm home. And I know how to get rid of Ultimus, once and for all.
As Ultimus ripped holes in the fabric of reality, a shard of the Phoenix Force was torn from me and trapped in another dimension.
If the Phoenix is trapped, that dimension is a prison even Ultimus can't escape from. But Wanda, I think you can open it.
I'll do whatever I can to help end Ultimus. But why me?
You're the guardian of the Nexus and M'Kraan Crystal. We can use the crystal as a key to that dimension.
Guardian? Ha! None of you have the common sense or mystic skill to use that crystal wisely.
It sounds like you just volunteered to join us, Mordo.
Ultimus has no idea that he's summoned his own undoing.
Of all the backwater planets we could visit, why Morag?
We're following the crystal to this prison dimension. It led us here.
Ey! These weirdos are looking to get in on our score! Ravagers, take 'em out!
Locals. And they're restless. Defend yourself!
DARK PHOENIX UNLEASHES A TORRENT OF COSMIC FIRE ON HER ENEMIES
DARK PHOENIX'S <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> STEALS HEALTH FROM ENEMIES TO HERSELF AND APPLIES <color=#fff568>REGENERATION</color> TO X-MEN ALLIES
DARK PHOENIX'S <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> DAMAGES ALL ENEMIES AND REMOVES <color=#fff568>POSITIVE EFFECTS</color> ON THEM
Nothing here! I'm shocked that there's no gateway to another dimension in this disgusting mud pit.
Your optimism is infectious, Mordo. The path forward is here, we just can't traverse it.
We need a way to move through realities as a group. Any ideas?
I think I know someone.
Fear not, mi gente. I'm here to help.
Who are you, exactly?
America Chavez. Your ticket to the multiverse.
See these muscles? They're not just for show. I punch holes in the universe. Then we go through. Get it?
Can you take us somewhere specific?\nI'm telepathically showing you where.
Got it. Let me know if you see anything else you like while poking around my head, Red...
I typically prefer interdimensional magic a bit more precise\nthan "punch it real hard."
If this one wants to stay behind, I'm not going to complain. Now, get ready!
We're through. How did we end up in an A.I.M. lab?
Realities are strung together like a chain of pearls. This is the one adjacent to the dimension we're trying to access.
Unfortunately, it's one where the Scientist Supreme and A.I.M. have taken over Earth.
Um, excuse you. Scientist Supreme is out. I'm in charge here.
And as Spider-Supreme, I'm happy to announce you're all my next test subjects!
AMERICA CHAVEZ IS A MYSTICAL BRAWLER WHO EXCELS AT SINGLE TARGET DAMAGE
AMERICA CHAVEZ'S <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> CLEARS <color=#fff568>POSITIVE EFFECTS</color> AND DEALS A MASSIVE AMOUNT OF DAMAGE TO AN ENEMY
Hm, first run of trials on my "destroying heroes" experiment isn't producing great results.
Sorry to hear that. Come closer and I'll show you some results at least one of us will be happy with.
Oh, I'm not worried. That was just the control group.
I can feel the barrier between worlds here. Wanda, can you use the M'Kraan to open the way?
Just give me a moment and we'll be out of h-- AARGH!
The barrier is more powerful than I feared. It's going to take a massive amount of mystic energy to open it.
Perhaps I can be of assistance.
Strange?!
This dimension's Doctor Strange, yes. The arrival of a new M'Kraan Crystal on this plane drew me to you.
If the crystal falls into Spider-Supreme's deranged hands, he'll be even more powerful. Let me help you escape.
Strange is giving us a chance. Let's not waste it.
The last time someone from your dimension came through, they stole the blueprints to my fancy new collider!
I'm not letting you leave after you saw all my cool toys!
Protect me while I focus our mystic energies into the crystal!
I have begun the casting...
1 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
The crystal is fighting back, but I am in control...
2 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
Energies are aligning. We're close to complete!
3 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
The ritual is complete!\nNow, focus on the crystal!
America, when I hit it with my flames... do what you do.
Here goes nothing!
America?! Jean, she was left behind!
The girl can certainly handle herself. As for us... what is this place?
A dimension where the M'Kraan shattered. Destroying everything. Becoming one with everything.
In our home, I prevented this. I'm not surprised the Phoenix shard was drawn here.
Poor, foolish mutant. You've dragged your friends to their eternal resting place.
Ultimus?!\nHow can he be here already?
It's not Ultimus. This dimension is like a mirror, showing us a twisted reflection of our own. Prepare yourselves!
Fate led you here. To me. To your end!
These reflections are stronger than I imagined.
This entire dimension is a warped prison, doing its best to keep us in. We're lucky to have survived.
Let's keep moving. I don't want to press our luck.
How much deeper into this infernal hellscape must we go?
For you, sorcerer?\nThe journey is at an end.
Is this the best this place can do?\nA pale reflection of myself?
You think we're part of this dimension? Ha!
Argh! That mystic blast...
These aren't illusions! Ultimus's mystics must have followed us!
Did you think your plan would go unnoticed? Ultimus sent us to pursue you from the Nexus.
And when the girl struck the crystal, we followed you here.
Prepare to meet your end.
They're fleeing. But where could they possibly go?
They'll be lost here. We have a bigger challenge ahead, though.
Me.
Jean Grey. You seek to reclaim what you let free.
You're a remnant of the Phoenix's power. I'm here to bring you back into the Phoenix Force.
My power has grown since arriving. I've become one with this place. Would you separate the stars from the sky?
If it meant preventing the end of all things.
Then come and try. And experience an end of your own.
If we weaken her, I can absorb the Phoenix energy and create a way out of this place.
If you're bold enough to face me, let's see how you fare against reflections of your own allies.
I've seen the Phoenix's power run amok before, firsthand. You were never going to win this, little shard.
Come home.
You've reabsorbed her?
She was never real. Not really.
With the full Phoenix recovered, the crystal, and your mystic powers... we should be able to reenter this dimension and make it Ultimus's tomb.
I didn't think it could be done...
Maybe next time, Mordo, you'll have a little more faith.
This Stark Tech facility should be teeming with Ultimus's forces. No need for stealth. Ben, would you be kind enough to break us in?
What are you hopin' to find, Stretch-O?
My instruments have been detecting a strange element building up in the layers between realities. I'm hoping to learn more here.
Sorry, Reed! The only thing you're learning is a lesson in why you don't drop in on me without at least a "U Up?" text.
Rockets? Engage.
Huh... There's usually a bigger, earth-shattering "Ka-Boom!" here.
Invisible force field. Sorry, Tony.
Now, let's see what else I can make vanish.
Man, I hate all these duplicates but at least now we can prove that Iron Man's no match for the F.F.!
I wouldn't take too much pride in this fight, Johnny. These corrupted versions are fundamentally weaker than their free-willed counterparts.
Reed, dear? Maybe wait to tell him that until after the fight.
INVISIBLE WOMAN IS A POWERFUL PROTECTOR WHO GRANTS <color=#fff568>BARRIER</color> AND POSITIVE EFFECTS TO HER ALLIES.
HER <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> APPLIES <color=#fff568>STEALTH</color> TO ALL ALLIES EXCEPT THE ALLY WITH THE MOST HEALTH, GRANTING THEM OTHER POWERFUL DEFENSIVE STATUS EFFECTS.

INVISIBLE WOMAN'S <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> GRANTS <color=#fff568>BARRIER </color> TO HER TEAM, WHILE HER <color=#fff568>PASSIVE ABILITY</color> DAMAGES ANY ENEMY WHO ATTACKS A <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> MEMBER WITH BARRIER.
The data we recovered... it's not good, Fury.
Dr. Richards, you've been back home for five minutes and you're already telling me it's doomsday?
When Ultimus invades our dimension, it tears reality asunder. Each new tear keeps our world from healing, filling it with cosmic scar tissue.
Unless they're allowed to heal, and soon, there won't even be a dimension here for us to go to war over.
Well, if anyone has ideas about disabling Kree Eternal dimension-hopping tech, now's the time to share.
Looking at the energy signatures, Fury, it appears Ultimus's device isn't Kree. It's one of mine. I just haven't built it yet.
These are my plans for a device to facilitate an interdimensional evacuation. It was too dangerous to build, so I never completed it.
Ultimus must have gotten these plans from a corrupted counterpart of mine and built it.
These plans... We have seen this device before, in the lab of the Spider-Supreme on another Earth.
And he seemed unhinged enough to endanger all of reality with it.
You barely escaped last time you were in his lab. A frontal assault could be a disaster.
With my help we can get in, destroy the device, and get out. I just need a team who can deal with an evil Spider-Man.
Ms. Storm, it sounds like you're in need of exactly our expertise.
Osborn, we have to work together, but just because you're S.T.R.I.K.E. doesn't mean I trust you or your team.
We're here to kill a Spider-Man, aren't we? Certainly you can trust us to do THAT.
Intruders! I thought the Spider-Supreme disintegrated the Sinister Six and turned them into lab decorations?
They must be more intruders from Nexus Earth. Looks like the Spider-Supreme is getting a new goblin-based lava lamp.
I can make you invisible, but I can't make you silent. If we don't keep it down, we'll be discovered before we can shut this device down.
Lady, we bust enough heads and ain't nobody gonna be left to discover nothin'.
Rude as Rhino may be, we weren't sent for our espionage skills.
Get us to the device and to this so-called Spider-Supreme, then you'll see what we bring to the table.
These mutants, they're not just corrupted, they've been genetically modified.
The last time S.T.R.I.K.E. encountered Spider-Supreme, it was Phoenix who destroyed part of his lab and escaped.
Hm, so he decided if he couldn't beat them... genetically modify them and force them to join you?
Heh. Finally, a Spider-Man I can respect. Almost a pity, I'll enjoy destroying him... marginally less.
Osborn - up ahead, more of Spider-Supreme's mutant experiments.
Let's test his results, shall we?
Creed, the intruders you detected... are they here?
They're tryin' to hide, but I can smell 'em. And they smell like dead meat to me.
Well, no need to keep quiet anymore. Let's go, hairball!
The Spider-Supreme's experiments are faltering! Let's see if we can add a few variables and get different results!
Scientist! Don't worry, I'm here.
*cough* Dear leader!\nWe... we tried to fight them off...
And you succeeded! Did they discover the location of our interdimensional device?
Ha! No, the fools are two floors above it and have no clue.
Well, I guess...
...we have a clue now. For a super genius, you're not very bright, huh?
Okay, this is where that idiot Scientist told us the device would be.
Careful. I'm guessing that regardless of where it is, it'll probably be protected.
Boy, I sure hope so.
We've got a bead on the intruders that Sabretooth went looking for! Send backup!
Rhino? Move these crumpled bodies into a single pile, if you could. They're unconscious but still very much in the way.
Now, let's look under the hood of this machine we've heard so much about.
Oh, wow! More Sinister Six for me to destroy! And you're uncorrupted? What a treat.
Ultimus KIND OF frowns on me destroying the Green Goblins he's got control over. (Not that that stops me.)
So, you think you can just waltz in here and take my interdimensional garage door opener, eh?
You need to listen to us. Even if you serve Ultimus, the device is destroying the Nexus dimension.
Um, so? What part of "Mad Scientist" don't you people understand?
Besides, if I stopped using it, then I wouldn't have so many extra copies of my pals to enslave! I'd have to go back to clones.
(And TRUST ME, this is so much easier than clones.)
Speaking of which, here come my friends now!
So, Rhino, OBVIOUSLY I'll stuff and mount you. With that big ol' horn? Classic.
But Normie, what do you think I should do with your hide? Maybe some Goblin-skin boots?
Ha! What a joy this version of you is, Spider. Perhaps once we're done crushing you, I'll keep you as a pet.
S.T.R.I.K.E. sends a band of petty criminals and a den mother to deal with us?
Borderline insulting. Good thing we can take that insult out on them.
JESSICA JONES AND BLACK WIDOW HAVE BEEN ALTERED BY SPIDER-SUPREME! THEY'LL USE THEIR ULTIMATE ABILITY EVERY TURN.
We're clear, but for who knows how long. Mysterio, Osborn, can you disable the machine?
I've got experience dealing with interdimensional technology, but this appears more complex than I'm used to. It'll take time to fully disable.
This is the problem with Richards' technology. With so many tubes and valves... there's no elegance.
If you continue to insult my husband, Norman, you're just making it more difficult for me to make sure you get home in one piece.
Especially considering how many pieces I want you to be in! Hi, remember me? And my army of pals?
We're outnumbered!\nEveryone, fall back!
Great, on the run from Spider-Man and an army of Avengers. If I wanted this, I coulda stayed in New York!
Keep complaining, Shocker, and I'll give you to Ultimus myself.
We need a plan, now.
Perhaps, yet again, I can be of assistance.
Stephen?! Are you from our world, or...?
No, this is my home. I aided S.T.R.I.K.E. before, not long ago. Unfortunately, the ensuing chaos took much out of me.
I've been trapped in this compound. But if you allow me a moment to gather my strength, I believe I can provide an escape.
Oh, jeez! Wow! Doctor Strange! I'm such a big fan!
Keep it together, mijita! We're here to defeat him, not get an autograph.
Oh! Right! Grrr!
I'll offer what assistance I can, but if I fall, you may end up trapped in this dimension!
PROTECT <color=#fff568>DOCTOR STRANGE</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Strange has fallen! You've trapped us here, Osborn!
I feel the energy of the planes flowing through me. At last. I can channel my mystic force...
Wait... something's not right... Osborn, we're in trouble.
...into your destruction.
Stephen... how? Why?
When last I aided your friends, Spider-Supreme was able to reach me and convince me of the glory of Ultimus.
Forgive the wounded sorcerer deception, but I needed the time to peer into your astral selves and sense your true purpose.
So, by ripping your dimension apart, we're making a powerful new element?! I'm so excited my Spider-Sense is TINGLING!
(And not the one that detects danger.)
We'll have to make even more trips back to your hood, if only so we can see what that stuff does once I get my hands on it.
I'll have to rescind my earlier offer to let you live, bug. Sinister Six? SQUASH them all!
You guys are supposed to be the brains of this operation. How the heck do we get out of this one?
Ultimus's machine. If we reach it, we can get home.
But how are we supposed to destroy the machine from Nexus Earth?
We can't, but we can at least close the portal from behind and tell Fury what we've learned.
But to do that... we need to survive this fight!
SPIDER-SUPREME HAS A HIGHER CHANCE TO DODGE ATTACKS, AND WILL USE HIS ULTIMATE ABILITY TO STUN  EVERY TURN.
DOCTOR STRANGE HAS BEEN ENHANCED BY SPIDER-SUPREME. EVERY OTHER TIME HE TAKES AN ACTION, DOCTOR STRANGE WILL REVIVE AN ALLY.
We're winning and they're still getting away!? Well, this is Spider-Supremely annoying!
Quickly! Through the portal, we don't have much time.
We'll be back, Spider. We'll return and I'll be taking this tech and your hide with it.
Promises, promises!
Now, go now!
12 Hours Later...
Well, I've debriefed your team. This mission wasn't what I would call a rousing success.
It wasn't a failure, though. Mysterio wasn't able to disassemble Ultimus's device, but he did get a look at the modifications they made.
With that intel, I've developed a mechanism that I'm confident can disable it quickly.
Tactics 101. If Ultimus knows we need the machine, he's going to move it.
Then we better find it.\nAnd find it fast.
Quake, we're getting some strange energy readings that need your attention.
Aren't energy readings more of a Reed Richards thing, sir?
It's not the readings, it's where they're coming from: The Blue Area of the Moon.
Attilan?! Is the kingdom of the Inhumans in trouble?
Possibly. Black Bolt thinks he's protecting his people by keeping out of this, but if the fight's landed on his doorstep...
Then helping them could finally convince them to join forces with S.T.R.I.K.E. We're on the way.
Your Highness. Nick Fury sent us.
Right. Well, how can we help? Where's the problem?
Inhumans, your stand against Ultimus is futile. Those I do not destroy will be converted!
Ah, there it is.
BLACK BOLT IS AN <color=#fff568>INHUMAN BLASTER</color> WHO USES THE DEVASTATING POWER OF HIS VOICE TO DEAL MASSIVE DAMAGE TO HIS ENEMIES.
BLACK BOLT'S <color=#fff568>PASSIVE ABILITY</color> DEALS DAMAGE TO ENEMIES THE FIRST TIME THEIR HEALTH DROPS BELOW A CERTAIN PERCENTAGE.
IN ADDITION TO DEALING DAMAGE, BLACK BOLT'S <color=#fff568>PASSIVE ABILITY</color> PREVENTS ANY CHARACTER HE DEFEATS FROM BEING <color=#fff568>REVIVED</color>.
I'm disappointed that these Inhumans give you so much trouble, Ultron.
Perhaps our combined strength will teach them a lesson.
Fury, it's bad. Ultimus has both Ultron and Thanos attacking Attilan.
Ultimus wouldn't send that much firepower for a simple assault. Whatever's happening, we need to be on top of it.
I'm calling down the thunder.
Let us see how Ultron and Thanos fare against our might now.
Blackagar Boltagon, ruler of the Inhumans! The mighty Thor greets you!
I see his vocabulary is only slightly more limited than yours, brother.
Black Bolt's voice can level mountains, Loki. Keep needling, perhaps he'll have a word with you.
Fear not, friend. We shall halt this attack on your city and free your people from the threat of Ultimus!
So, Fury sends his Asgardians. Make this easy on yourselves. Give me Black Bolt.
Thanos, Black Bolt does not hide. The Inhuman King speaks for himself.
My lord, Thanos and his forces retreat!
They have fallen back, aye, but it is no retreat. They were purchasing time.
You appear to be correct. I see our foes readying a great contraption at the core of the city!
A false retreat and now a "contraption"? I know a sinister scheme when I see one.
We must take the city back... Wait... What is that rumble?
The ground shakes! By Odin!
Attilan! It's... gone!
They opened a portal large enough to swallow the entire Inhuman capital!
I see it, Lady Sif. By Odin... We must go through it and give chase.
Well, Thanos and Ultron are gone. What say we leave and celebrate a job well done?
Black Bolt, shall we follow the cowardly advice of my brother? Or charge forth into the unknown?
Aye! Asgardians! To battle!
A jungle... Heimdall, can your sight give us guidance?
We are on an Earth, on the southmost point of the globe.
All that matters is that you are in the Kree Empire, trespassers. And you are now my prisoners.
Trapped in the Savage Land, on an Earth that belongs to the Kree.\nHappy now, oh mighty Thor?
These Kree are servants of Ultimus, which means we are set on the right path.
My lord, someone approaches.
I guess I can't feel too bad about being spotted. You are gods, after all.
We are ready for battle, Widow. Do not test us.
I wouldn't dream of it. You're exactly who we need to help us resist Ultimus.
We haven't had Asgardians here in... a long time. Not since Ultimus and the Kree took over.
We can give aid, Widow, but we are in the middle of a quest already. To find Attilan.
The Inhuman city?\nPretty sure it's on the moon.
Our Attilan is not. Ultimus has brought it here. We gave chase but know not where it hides.
Passing through the portal has clouded my vision. All I know is that it is near.
Well, if it's on our Earth, I have S.H.I.E.L.D. satellites that can find it.
I just need a minute to align the satellites...
Natasha! I come home early and find you with... Ultimus's Asgardians?! I'm shocked!
Wade, these are Asgardians from another dimension, they're not with Ultimus.
Oh, sure, like they just "dropped out of the sky" through "a magic portal."
OR is it more likely that you did a patented Black Widow double-cross against the resistance?! You're coming with me!
PROTECT <color=#fff568>BLACK WIDOW</color> TO WIN.
Okay, I've connected to the satellites. Just need to align them.
1 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
I'm honing in on Attilan's location! Almost there...
2 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
The city is here in the Savage Land! Just need to narrow down the quadrant.
3 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
My link to the satellite is broken! I'm sorry, we can't find Attilan.
I've got it! I know where Attilan is!
Cease your attack, talkative one, lest you feel Mjolnir's swing again.
Okay, okay! I give! Yeesh.\nAll you had to do was ask.
I thought you were with Ultimus! How many times do I have to say sorry?
You haven't said it once.
Sure I did! "..."
It's not my fault you don't speak Inhuman.
Thor, Black Bolt? Attilan isn't far. We can get you there but getting in won't be easy.
I do not know Black Bolt's words, but I know his heart. We shall meet the challenge head on!
Ah, here you are! Be a collective dear and surrender so we might end you quickly, eh?
My, such palpable condescension. I think I like this one.
Tsk, this group of so-called sorcerers were no match for us. If only they'd asked, I could have told them that from the start.
We're inside the city, but where are the Inhumans? This stillness worries me.
Quiet is an ill omen, Lady Sif. It's why I prefer thunder.
Ahead, my liege! I see a great technological abhorrence.
What is this device? I see Ultron's handiwork as well as that of the Inhumans...
Well observed, trickster. Ultron allows me to combine the Terrigen Mists with Ultimus's Conversion Engine.
This corrupted mist will change anyone exposed to it, not just Inhumans. And all of them will be loyal to Ultimus.
Not if Black Bolt and I destroy this abomination first, Titan.
You? Heh.\nUltron, clear away these gnats for me.
You heard the boss. Let's soften these Asgardians up for Ultron.
False gods of flesh! Bow before your technological superior!
Robot, you are nothing but rattling steel to be re-forged by my hammer.
No! My machinery... destroyed! By you pathetic beings of meat? How?!
Well said, good Black Bolt.
Your foul machinery is destroyed, and your clockwork warrior defeated! You will have no corrupted Terrigen this day, Thanos.
You were swift, Asgardian.\nBut not swift enough.
Oh, very clever. Don't you see, brother? He already has some.
Just enough corrupted Terrigen to enhance my powers.\nEnough to be your end.
And once I've crushed you under my heel, Black Bolt, I will turn to your city... and see it turned to rubble.
Can you not tell what the King of the Inhumans demands?!
BRING HIM THANOS!
Here I am... Come and get me!
Surrender, Thanos. You have been bested.
You see this as victory? You've done nothing but momentarily delay Ultimus's victory.
Perhaps. But with the aid of the Inhumans, perhaps not.
Black Bolt, your people are safe and shall soon be returned home. Will you aid S.T.R.I.K.E.?
Aye! I am glad to know you, good king.
How have you been able to glean ANYTHING from this living statue?
Noble warriors need not words to know each other, Loki!
As sure as I am the God of Thunder, we may depend on Black Bolt and the Inhumans!
ATTILAN, KINGDOM OF THE INHUMANS\nTHE BLUE AREA OF THE MOON...
Storm the gates! Take no prisoners! Seize Attilan... For Doom!
Phew, okay, I just need a breather... Then... Let me at 'em...
Kamala, rest. You're exhausted. We all are. This siege appears endless.
When Fury told us to guard Earth while he was gone, I don't think he expected Doctor Doom to strike.
Attilan may not hold much longer, Crystal. For the first time in my memory... I feel fear.
What does Black Bolt say, Crystal? What would he have us do?
He says we fight... to the last Inhuman. To battle!
Okay, I got a second wind! I don't care how many baddies there are, I can embiggen enough for all of 'em!
We could all use some of your bravery, kid. Let's do it.
We're holding them off, but even more reinforcements arrive! I fear this is the end of us.
Perhaps I, a humble servant of Thanos, can be of assistance.
EBONY MAW IS THE <color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER'S SUPPORT</color>, WHO USES HIS SINISTER POWERS TO MANIPULATE STATUS EFFECTS AND DRAIN THE ENEMY TEAM.
EBONY MAW'S <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> GRANTS ALLIES <color=#fff568>DEFENSE UP</color> WHILE APPLYING <color=#fff568>OFFENSE DOWN</color> TO ALL ENEMIES.
HIS <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> STEALS HEALTH FROM ALL ENEMIES AND <color=#fff568>SLOWS</color> THEM, GIVING THE STOLEN HEALTH TO HIS ALLIES.
Ebony Maw... He turned the tide. What trickery is this?!
Your royal highness, Black Bolt. I, Ebony Maw, humble servant of Thanos, have arrived at your aid.
Black Bolt says that, given your master, he's eager for you to explain yourself.
My master is by Nick Fury's side, battling Ultimus on Hala. But while Thanos is powerful, he is also clever.
The Black Order seeks an additional way to defeat Ultimus. One I need the aid of the powerful Inhumans to acquire.
I speak, of course... of the Infinity Stones.
Do you really think us foolish enough to help Thanos find the Infinity Stones?!
The opposite. I think Black Bolt is wise enough to see that Doom has taken hold of the Nexus, and he will not let it go easily.
In a nearby dimension, three stones are being held in one place. We can seize them in one fell swoop.
The stones are too powerful to be in the hands of one being. We get them, we'll need to bring them straight to S.T.R.I.K.E.
As you wish. Aid me, oh Black Bolt, and I promise the Infinity Stones shall only be used to protect the Nexus.
Black Bolt, what's the play here? We can't win against Doom without him. But we can't trust him either.
Excellent. Our first step... \nfinding a way out of this reality.
Doom has blocked entrance to Nexus, but not exit. The portal in this base of Ultimus's on Mercury should lead to the reality with the stones.
Hey, Sam! Looks like we have some party crashers. Should we crash back?
Ultimus is defeated, which means we've got nothing left to lose. Let's blow this base and take them all with it.
DEFEAT THE <color=#fff568>ENEMY OPERATORS</color> BEFORE THEY DESTROY THE FACILITY.
Planting enough charges to destroy this base and take all of us with it!
1 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
Charges planted! Arming now...
2 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
All explosives are armed! Ready to detonate...
3 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
The fools! They're bringing this facility down around us!
Those corrupted Avengers were going to blow us all to heck! What the, uh... heck?!
They mentioned that Ultimus was defeated. S.T.R.I.K.E. must have been successful on Hala!
A glorious victory, to be sure. But we have no idea at what cost it came. We must hurry to our destination.
Come, my Inhuman friends! Through the portal...
Woah. A city of golden spires combined with tech that looks... Kree-like? They're beautiful.
And ominous. Where are we, Maw?
You're right to feel dread. We are on Asgard, but not as you know it. Eons ago, this Asgard was conquered by the Kree Empire.
Imagine the power and arrogance of Odin and the Supreme Intelligence combined.
Power which let them capture three stones. And arrogance that kept all three in the one place together, the Palace Vault.
Okay. We break into this vault, get the stones, and then...
Do not concern yourselves with what happens next, invaders. You will not live to see it.
You attempt to invade the great Kree capitol of Asgard? With this scant force?
When I saw them enter our world, I was almost insulted at their number, Accuser.
Let us demonstrate the offense we've suffered, Heimdall. With our weapons!
Splendid! The might of the Inhumans has not been exaggerated, o' Black Bolt.
Now, follow me to the Palace Vault, and we may be on our way.
I don't get it, your highness! You trust this big ol' creep?
Our king doesn't trust any who serve Thanos, Kamala, Ebony Maw least of all.
But Black Bolt has faith that, when Maw betrays us, the might of the Inhumans shall prevail.
When you said the stones were in the "Palace Vault," I thought you meant the vault was IN the palace, not the SIZE of one!
The spoils of an empire of Kree and Asgardians are vast.
Once we enter, we must find the stones quickly for they shall not be unguarded.
Okay, so how do we get in?
Karnak? I believe you can see exactly the flaw in this security system.
Yes. And one well-placed blow should exploit it. Get ready, everyone! Here we go!
So, enemies of the Empire wish to steal its wealth! Prepare to fall, thieves, before Thor, the Accuser!
Ugh, what is it with these guys and their hammers?!
Okay, no more Thors! We did it! Right, guys? That was the end?
My reconnaissance revealed the location of the stones, so we are not far, child.
But... you should expect more resistance once we find them.
The stones! Yes, I can sense them, they're close. Quickly, now!
Watch Maw closely, Quake. We need him, but do not let your guard down.
Yes! They're here! The Reality, Time, and Soul Stones, within our grasp...
True! Now, please, reach out your hand! And have it lopped off!
Silly mortals want to play with gods' toys, hmm?
Well, if you want to play, let's play! Try and keep up!
Heimdall, close the gates to this vault and seal our new playmates in with us!
DEFEAT THE <color=#fff568>ENEMY OPERATORS</color> BEFORE THEY SEAL THE VAULT
I have begun the process of sealing your prey in, my Queen.
1 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
I am using the Bifrost to rearrange the rooms in the vault. They'll never find their way out.
2 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
A few more gates to close and then... they're sealed in for good!
3 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
They've closed every part of the vault! We're cut off from the Infinity Stones... And our way out!
Here they are... the stones. Thank you for your aid, Black Bolt. Now, if you will stand aside...
The king reminds you of your promise. You take the stones, and we use them to protect the Nexus.
Of course. Now, so close, I can access all that power...
...to summon the stones' one true master! Come, Thanos, and take your rightful place at the crossroads of the multiverse!
Maw. You have served me well, yet again. Now, let us dispose of this Inhuman trash.
Lord Thanos, I present you with your bounty... The Soul Stone. The Time Stone. And the Reality Stone.
Using their power to draw me to you once you found them was wise, faithful servant.
It's time, master. Time for you to show the multiverse what destiny looks like.
What happened to your promise, Maw?! You have no honor?
I pledged to use to the stones to keep the Nexus safe, Inhuman.
And who better to guard it than glorious Thanos?
We can still stop him. He's only got half the stones.
A fair point.
Ebony Maw, bring your brothers and sister here. It's time the Black Order is made whole again.
Come, Black Order! Arrive and bring with you the power our master so richly deserves!
We humbly serve!
Claim your strength, and direct us as your will dictates, Lord Thanos.
At last. The gauntlet... Complete.
WHEN ON A TEAM WITH THE BLACK ORDER, THANOS COMPLETES THE INFINITY GAUNTLET AND BECOMES <color=#fff568>EMPOWERED</color>!
AN <color=#fff568>EMPOWERED</color> CHARACTER HAS NEW, MORE DEVASTATING VERSIONS OF THEIR ABILITIES.
UNLEASH THE POWER OF THE INFINITY GAUNTLET ON YOUR ENEMIES AND EXPERIENCE THE GLORY OF <color=#fff568>EMPOWERED</color> THANOS!
Stop... you can't...
Can't? I think you'll find, little Inhuman, that word no longer applies to me.
Now, to return to the Nexus and leave you stranded here, to the mercy of the Kree.
Hmm. I willed our return to the Nexus, and yet we remain. Maw, what false stones have you brought me?
They are true, Lord Thanos! I don't know what prevents our return! Please, allow me to examine them...
Heh, guess there are a few things you can't do.
For that, insect, I'll make you watch as I kill your king.
So, Black Bolt? Any final words, or will you remain silent as your people die?
...Never.
ARGH!!!
My king, are you alright?
Your cry wounded Thanos and his Black Order, my lord. They've retreated through a portal.
We're badly hurt, Black Bolt. Should we regroup?
The king is right. The Black Order having the Infinity Stones is too dangerous. We have to follow.
Through the portal.
What is this place? It's a wasteland...
GGGGGGGraaaaagh...
Mindless, corrupted Avengers incoming! We'll find answers later!
Bleck! I hated seeing Iron Man and the Hulk like that! What's wrong with them?
They were corrupted, but like none we'd seen before. They had no will of their own at all. Like they were husks.
The beings of this world were broken by the Conversion Engine, left too mindless to be soldiers, but still deadly enough to be weapons.
And now that you've followed me to their home, I'll use these husks to end you.
I earn my redemption through your destruction, Inhuman. Prepare to die, in tribute to Thanos.
Stoic as ever. But let's see you dare stand against the might of three Infinity Stones!
Stones that failed you and your master once, Maw.
I see. I see why they're not working as you desire. Can you?
Perhaps you'll tell me, Karnak. In between screams for mercy!
Do not let up! Do not falter! We will win this battle, as Inhumans!
I... I don't understand. The stones...
These Infinity Stones are powerful, true. But I see their weakness.
Removed from their original dimensions, they are no longer the gateway to omnipotence your master desires.
I've failed...
True. But while these stones won't allow me to bring order to the Nexus directly, they can still be of use.
We'll keep these stones, silent king. And we'll use them as promised, to help S.T.R.I.K.E.
What?! No way, we totally can't let them keep these stones, can we?
Lord Black Bolt has decreed...
I need no translation. Your lord has weighed the risk of extending our temporary alliance... and has found it acceptable.
True. But he also decrees that once we no longer need you... Black Bolt shall enact justice swiftly, and personally.
All S.T.R.I.K.E. agents! Our base has been discovered! Get to battle stations!
How'd Doom find us? We just moved into this secret hideout! I barely had time to unpack my underoos.
Since Doom took over Earth, he's turned people against S.T.R.I.K.E.
Someone must have spotted us, called it in, and now we have Doom's army of villains knocking down our door.
Sorry, Fury. I'm used to the public hating me, but this must be new for you.
I didn't get in the spy game to be liked, Parker. Now get to your station, this fight isn't going to be easy!
Knock knock, S.T.R.I.K.E.! Did your little rebellion really think you could hide from Doom?
Do I look scared to you? Doom's not the first dictator I've gotten rid of.
We're getting overrun up here! S.T.R.I.K.E. forces, get ready to abandon base...
Not so fast, Director Fury. These fools did not count on having to contend with the genius of me, Otto Octavius!
What?! Doc Ock? Is someone pranking me? Wolverine, is that you in a very convincing bodysuit?
We will deal with your ego later, arachnid! For now, Doctor Octopus is here to save you all.
A SCIENTIFIC GENIUS AND MASTER MANIPULATOR, DOCTOR OCTOPUS IS THE LEADER OF <color=#fff568>THE SINISTER SIX</color>!
DOCTOR OCTOPUS'S <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> SUMMONS A MISSING MEMBER OF THE <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> TO THE FIGHT.
HIS <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> ATTACKS ALL ENEMIES AND FLIPS <color=#fff568>POSITIVE EFFECTS</color> TO <color=#fff568>NEGATIVE EFFECTS</color> .
Okay, Octavius. What's your game here?
I expected a little more gratitude, Fury. My compatriots and I did just swoop in and rescue you, after all.
Well, excuse me for not rolling out the red carpet for every six-armed maniac who comes bearing gifts.
More than gifts, Director. I come with the chance for freedom.
While you gallivanted among the cosmos, we remained here on Earth, resisting Doom's empire.
With my genius and your resources, we can rid Earth of the tyranny of Doom, once and for all!
Doom has concealed crucial pieces of his operation. But through sheer force of intellect, I have discovered them.
With my impeccable planning, we can disrupt these key stations of Doom's, and gain an advantage against him.
You seem pretty confident. What do you need us for? Why don't you use your Sinister Six?
Rhino? Shocker? They're blunt instruments. But this operation requires a scalpel.
While no one in S.T.R.I.K.E. is a match for Otto Octavius's brilliance, you do command a number of black ops teams.
So? What do you say, Fury?
I think I know exactly the team. X-Force? Fall in.
Ooooh, a road trip! I'll bring the jerky!
I bodyslid the team into the warehouse in New York you told us about. What's so special about this place, Ock?
This is the central port for all of Doom's exports to Europe. We disrupt him here, his supply lines falter.
You face the Hand, intruders! You've returned to Earth only to die here.
Red pajamas! Don't you hate it when you show up to a party and someone's wearing the same thing as you?
How do you stand this buffoon? He's worse than the spider... Almost.
Deadpool has his uses. Like, for instance, taking out those Hand who are escaping.
What?! They can't be allowed to warn Doom! Our assault has only just begun.
Mystics! Prepare a portal out of Hell's Kitchen. We'll regroup and inform Lord Doom what's transpired here.
Ah, Elektra. I've read up on you. Master assassin, leader of the Hand. I even heard tell you returned from the dead!
This time, my dear, you won't be so lucky.
Ock, if you're done giving speeches, we've got an operation to run.
If we don't take out those mystics, they're going to report back to Doom and we're done. Dom?
On it, Nate. Their luck is about to run out.
DEFEAT THE ENEMY OPERATORS BEFORE THEY ESCAPE!
Your pathetic efforts to stop us are pointless.
1 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
Focus your fire on the operators! We can't let them escape!
2 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
The portal is almost open! Hand, cover our exit!
3 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
You imbeciles! If you let them escape, you will answer to Doctor Octopus!
Excellent work, underlings. The Hand has fallen, and Doom's supply line is broken.
Though, Cable, your tone with me was... unacceptable.
Don't forget who's in charge here.
Oh, don't worry. I haven't.
Next stop, Peru. What are we facing there?
Ask the octopus. Apparently he's running the show.
Hmph. We're heading to Peru, where I have uncovered a secret Hydra lab.
While most of the world has traded Doom's security for their freedom, "partial domination" is hardly enough for the tyrant.
Hydra's been using modified genetic material from Swarm to turn the populace into an easily controlled hive-mind for Doom.
Our brains will be like cereal left soaking in milk for too long!\nNo one likes that! Let's go!
Ah, Doctor Octopus! I wondered what became of you after your escape from Doom's prison.
Well, whatever hole you crawled out of, you will wish you'd remained there instead of facing Hydra!
Remove one head, two more shall take its place! Hydra cannot be defeated!
Oh yeah? I'm from the future, Skull. And back home, no one's even heard of Hydra.
Then I shall have to etch its name into your mind! Unleash our S.W.A.R.M. technology!
Hydra is further along in their development of the mind-control technology than I thought. They're unleashing it now.
Domino, Negasonic! Hit them hard, hit them fast. We don't have a lot of time here.
You got it, boss.
Wade, do what you do and sow chaos.
No problem! I've got a pogo stick and a LOT of bullets.
Careful, Cable... You are dangerously close to overstepping.
Scold me later. Right now? I have a job to do.
They're through the perimeter! Hold them off while we prepare the mind-altering field!
Ah, Hydra. You think your tentacles grasp the world? Let me introduce you to what real reach is.
DEFEAT THE ENEMY OPERATORS TO WIN.
We've begun initializing the telepathic crowd control device! Powering up now...
1 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
The energy field is half powered!
2 / 4 STAGES COMPLETE.
Our device has reached full power. Preparing to unleash it! Hail Hydra!
